133// TODO: investigate serializing other members of the Creature class hierarchy
134static void serialize( const weak_ptr_fast<monster> &obj, JsonOut &jsout )
135{
136 if( const auto monster_ptr = obj.lock() ) {
137 jsout.start_object();
138
139 jsout.member( "monster_at", monster_ptr->pos() );
140 // TODO: if monsters/Creatures ever get unique ids,
141 // create a differently named member, e.g.
142 // jsout.member("unique_id", monster_ptr->getID());
143 jsout.end_object();
144 } else {
145 // Monster went away. It's up the activity handler to detect this.
146 jsout.write_null();
147 }
148}
149
150static void deserialize( weak_ptr_fast<monster> &obj, JsonIn &jsin )
151{
152 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
153 data.allow_omitted_members();
154 tripoint temp_pos;
155
156 obj.reset();
157 if( data.read( "monster_at", temp_pos ) ) {
158 const auto monp = g->critter_tracker->find( temp_pos );
159
160 if( monp == nullptr ) {
161 debugmsg( "no monster found at %d,%d,%d", temp_pos.x, temp_pos.y, temp_pos.z );
162 return;
163 }
164
165 obj = monp;
166 }
167
168 // TODO: if monsters/Creatures ever get unique ids,
169 // look for a differently named member, e.g.
170 // data.read( "unique_id", unique_id );
171 // obj = g->id_registry->from_id( unique_id)
172 // }
173}
174
175void item_contents::serialize( JsonOut &json ) const
176{
177 if( !items.empty() ) {
178 json.start_object();
179
180 json.member( "items", items );
181
182 json.end_object();
183 }
184}
185
186void item_contents::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
187{
188 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
189 data.allow_omitted_members();
190 data.read( "items", items );
191}

193////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
194///// player_activity.h
195
196void player_activity::serialize( JsonOut &json ) const
197{
198 json.start_object();
199 json.member( "type", type );
200
201 if( !type.is_null() ) {
202 json.member( "actor", actor );
203 json.member( "moves_left", moves_left );
204 json.member( "index", index );
205 json.member( "position", position );
206 json.member( "coords", coords );
207 json.member( "coord_set", coord_set );
208 json.member( "name", name );
209 json.member( "targets", targets );
210 json.member( "placement", placement );
211 json.member( "values", values );
212 json.member( "str_values", str_values );
213 json.member( "auto_resume", auto_resume );
214 json.member( "monsters", monsters );
215 }
216 json.end_object();
217}
218
219void player_activity::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
220{
221 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
222 data.allow_omitted_members();
223 data.read( "type", type );
224
225 if( type.is_null() ) {
226 return;
227 }
228
229 const bool has_actor = activity_actors::deserialize_functions.find( type ) !=
230 activity_actors::deserialize_functions.end();
231
232 // Handle migration of pre-activity_actor activities
233 // ACT_MIGRATION_CANCEL will clear the backlog and reset npc state
234 // this may cause inconvenience but should avoid any lasting damage to npcs
235 if( has_actor && !data.has_member( "actor" ) ) {
236 type = activity_id( "ACT_MIGRATION_CANCEL" );
237 }
238
239 data.read( "actor", actor );
240 data.read( "moves_left", moves_left );
241 data.read( "index", index );
242 data.read( "position", position );
243 data.read( "coords", coords );
244 data.read( "coord_set", coord_set );
245 data.read( "name", name );
246 data.read( "targets", targets );
247 data.read( "placement", placement );
248 values = data.get_int_array( "values" );
249 str_values = data.get_string_array( "str_values" );
250 data.read( "auto_resume", auto_resume );
251 data.read( "monsters", monsters );
252
253}
254
255////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
256///// requirements.h
257void requirement_data::serialize( JsonOut &json ) const
258{
259 json.start_object();
260
261 if( !is_null() ) {
262 json.member( "blacklisted", blacklisted );
263 const std::vector<std::vector<item_comp>> req_comps = get_components();
264 const std::vector<std::vector<tool_comp>> tool_comps = get_tools();
265 const std::vector<std::vector<quality_requirement>> quality_comps = get_qualities();
266
267 json.member( "req_comps_total", req_comps );
268
269 json.member( "tool_comps_total", tool_comps );
270
271 json.member( "quality_comps_total", quality_comps );
272 }
273 json.end_object();
274}
275
276void requirement_data::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
277{
278 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
279 data.allow_omitted_members();
280
281 data.read( "blacklisted", blacklisted );
282
283 data.read( "req_comps_total", components );
284 data.read( "tool_comps_total", tools );
285 data.read( "quality_comps_total", qualities );
286
287}

289////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
290///// skill.h
291void SkillLevel::serialize( JsonOut &json ) const
292{
293 json.start_object();
294 json.member( "level", level() );
295 json.member( "exercise", exercise( true ) );
296 json.member( "istraining", isTraining() );
297 json.member( "lastpracticed", _lastPracticed );
298 json.member( "highestlevel", highestLevel() );
299 json.end_object();
300}
301
302void SkillLevel::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
303{
304 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
305 data.allow_omitted_members();
306 data.read( "level", _level );
307 data.read( "exercise", _exercise );
308 data.read( "istraining", _isTraining );
309 if( !data.read( "lastpracticed", _lastPracticed ) ) {
310 _lastPracticed = calendar::start_of_cataclysm + time_duration::from_hours(
311 get_option<int>( "INITIAL_TIME" ) );
312 }
313 data.read( "highestlevel", _highestLevel );
314 if( _highestLevel < _level ) {
315 _highestLevel = _level;
316 }
317}

384/**
385 * Gather variables for saving. These variables are common to both the avatar and NPCs.
386 */
387void Character::load( const JsonObject &data )
388{
389 data.allow_omitted_members();
390 Creature::load( data );
391
392 if( !data.read( "posx", position.x ) ) { // uh-oh.
393 debugmsg( "BAD PLAYER/NPC JSON: no 'posx'?" );
394 }
395 data.read( "posy", position.y );
396 if( !data.read( "posz", position.z ) && g != nullptr ) {
397 position.z = g->get_levz();
398 }
399 // stats
400 data.read( "str_cur", str_cur );
401 data.read( "str_max", str_max );
402 data.read( "dex_cur", dex_cur );
403 data.read( "dex_max", dex_max );
404 data.read( "int_cur", int_cur );
405 data.read( "int_max", int_max );
406 data.read( "per_cur", per_cur );
407 data.read( "per_max", per_max );
408
409 data.read( "str_bonus", str_bonus );
410 data.read( "dex_bonus", dex_bonus );
411 data.read( "per_bonus", per_bonus );
412 data.read( "int_bonus", int_bonus );
413 data.read( "omt_path", omt_path );
414
415 data.read( "base_age", init_age );
416 data.read( "base_height", init_height );
417
418 if( !data.read( "profession", prof ) || !prof.is_valid() ) {
419 // We are likely an older profession which has since been removed so just set to default.
420 // This is only cosmetic after game start.
421 prof = profession::generic();
422 }
423 data.read( "custom_profession", custom_profession );
424
425 // needs
426 data.read( "thirst", thirst );
427 data.read( "fatigue", fatigue );
428 data.read( "sleep_deprivation", sleep_deprivation );
429 data.read( "stored_calories", stored_calories );
430 data.read( "radiation", radiation );
431 data.read( "oxygen", oxygen );
432 data.read( "pkill", pkill );
433
434 data.read( "type_of_scent", type_of_scent );
435
436 if( data.has_array( "ma_styles" ) ) {
437 std::vector<matype_id> temp_styles;
438 data.read( "ma_styles", temp_styles );
439 bool temp_keep_hands_free = false;
440 data.read( "keep_hands_free", temp_keep_hands_free );
441 matype_id temp_selected_style;
442 data.read( "style_selected", temp_selected_style );
443 if( !temp_selected_style.is_valid() ) {
444 temp_selected_style = matype_id( "style_none" );
445 }
446 martial_arts_data = pimpl<character_martial_arts>( character_martial_arts(
447 temp_styles, temp_selected_style, temp_keep_hands_free
448 ) );
449 } else {
450 data.read( "martial_arts_data", martial_arts_data );
451 }
452
453 JsonObject vits = data.get_object( "vitamin_levels" );
454 vits.allow_omitted_members();
455 for( const std::pair<const vitamin_id, vitamin> &v : vitamin::all() ) {
456 if( vits.has_member( v.first.str() ) ) {
457 int lvl = vits.get_int( v.first.str() );
458 vitamin_levels[v.first] = clamp( lvl, v.first->min(), v.first->max() );
459 }
460 }
461 data.read( "consumption_history", consumption_history );
462 data.read( "activity", activity );
463 data.read( "destination_activity", destination_activity );
464 data.read( "stashed_outbounds_activity", stashed_outbounds_activity );
465 data.read( "stashed_outbounds_backlog", stashed_outbounds_backlog );
466 data.read( "backlog", backlog );
467 if( !backlog.empty() && !backlog.front().str_values.empty() && ( ( activity &&
468 activity.id() == activity_id( "ACT_FETCH_REQUIRED" ) ) || ( destination_activity &&
469 destination_activity.id() == activity_id( "ACT_FETCH_REQUIRED" ) ) ) ) {
470 requirement_data fetch_reqs;
471 data.read( "fetch_data", fetch_reqs );
472 const requirement_id req_id( backlog.front().str_values.back() );
473 requirement_data::save_requirement( fetch_reqs, req_id );
474 }
475 // npc activity on vehicles.
476 data.read( "activity_vehicle_part_index", activity_vehicle_part_index );
477 // health
478 data.read( "healthy", healthy );
479 data.read( "healthy_mod", healthy_mod );
480 data.read( "healed_24h", healed_total );
481
482 // status
483 temp_cur.fill( 5000 );
484 data.read( "temp_cur", temp_cur );
485
486 temp_conv.fill( 5000 );
487 data.read( "temp_conv", temp_conv );
488
489 frostbite_timer.fill( 0 );
490 data.read( "frostbite_timer", frostbite_timer );
491
492 body_wetness.fill( 0 );
493 data.read( "body_wetness", body_wetness );
494
495 //energy
496 data.read( "stim", stim );
497 data.read( "stamina", stamina );
498
499 data.read( "damage_bandaged", damage_bandaged );
500 data.read( "damage_disinfected", damage_disinfected );
501 data.read( "magic", magic );
502 JsonArray parray;
503
504 data.read( "traits", my_traits );
505 for( auto it = my_traits.begin(); it != my_traits.end(); ) {
506 const auto &tid = *it;
507 if( tid.is_valid() ) {
508 ++it;
509 } else {
510 debugmsg( "character %s has invalid trait %s, it will be ignored", name, tid.c_str() );
511 my_traits.erase( it++ );
512 }
513 }
514
515 data.read( "mutations", my_mutations );
516 for( auto it = my_mutations.begin(); it != my_mutations.end(); ) {
517 const trait_id &mid = it->first;
518 if( mid.is_valid() ) {
519 on_mutation_gain( mid );
520 cached_mutations.push_back( &mid.obj() );
521 ++it;
522 } else {
523 debugmsg( "character %s has invalid mutation %s, it will be ignored", name, mid.c_str() );
524 it = my_mutations.erase( it );
525 }
526 }
527 recalculate_size();
528
529 data.read( "my_bionics", *my_bionics );
530
531 for( auto &w : worn ) {
532 w.on_takeoff( *this );
533 }
534 worn.clear();
535 data.read( "worn", worn );
536 for( auto &w : worn ) {
537 on_item_wear( w );
538 }
539
540 if( data.has_array( "hp_cur" ) ) {
541 set_anatomy( anatomy_id( "human_anatomy" ) );
542 set_body();
543 std::array<int, 6> hp_cur;
544 data.read( "hp_cur", hp_cur );
545 std::array<int, 6> hp_max;
546 data.read( "hp_max", hp_max );
547 set_part_hp_max( bodypart_id( "head" ), hp_max[0] );
548 set_part_hp_cur( bodypart_id( "head" ), hp_cur[0] );
549
550 set_part_hp_max( bodypart_id( "torso" ), hp_max[1] );
551 set_part_hp_cur( bodypart_id( "torso" ), hp_cur[1] );
552
553 set_part_hp_max( bodypart_id( "arm_l" ), hp_max[2] );
554 set_part_hp_cur( bodypart_id( "arm_l" ), hp_cur[2] );
555
556 set_part_hp_max( bodypart_id( "arm_r" ), hp_max[3] );
557 set_part_hp_cur( bodypart_id( "arm_r" ), hp_cur[3] );
558
559 set_part_hp_max( bodypart_id( "leg_l" ), hp_max[4] );
560 set_part_hp_cur( bodypart_id( "leg_l" ), hp_cur[4] );
561
562 set_part_hp_max( bodypart_id( "leg_r" ), hp_max[5] );
563 set_part_hp_cur( bodypart_id( "leg_r" ), hp_cur[5] );
564 }
565
566
567 inv.clear();
568 if( data.has_member( "inv" ) ) {
569 JsonIn *invin = data.get_raw( "inv" );
570 inv.json_load_items( *invin );
571 }
572
573 weapon = item( "null", calendar::start_of_cataclysm );
574 data.read( "weapon", weapon );
575
576 data.read( "move_mode", move_mode );
577
578 if( has_effect( effect_riding ) ) {
579 int temp_id;
580 if( data.read( "mounted_creature", temp_id ) ) {
581 mounted_creature_id = temp_id;
582 mounted_creature = g->critter_tracker->from_temporary_id( temp_id );
583 } else {
584 mounted_creature = nullptr;
585 }
586 }
587
588 morale->load( data );
589 // Have to go through effects again, in case an effect gained a morale bonus
590 for( const auto &elem : *effects ) {
591 for( const std::pair<const bodypart_str_id, effect> &_effect_it : elem.second ) {
592 const effect &e = _effect_it.second;
593 on_effect_int_change( e.get_id(), e.get_intensity(), e.get_bp() );
594 }
595 }
596
597 _skills->clear();
598 for( const JsonMember member : data.get_object( "skills" ) ) {
599 member.read( ( *_skills )[skill_id( member.name() )] );
600 }
601
602 data.read( "learned_recipes", *learned_recipes );
603 autolearn_skills_stamp->clear(); // Invalidates the cache
604
605 on_stat_change( "thirst", thirst );
606 on_stat_change( "stored_calories", stored_calories );
607 on_stat_change( "fatigue", fatigue );
608 on_stat_change( "sleep_deprivation", sleep_deprivation );
609 on_stat_change( "pkill", pkill );
610 on_stat_change( "perceived_pain", get_perceived_pain() );
611 recalc_sight_limits();
612 reset_encumbrance();
613
614 assign( data, "power_level", power_level, false, 0_kJ );
615 assign( data, "max_power_level", max_power_level, false, 0_kJ );
616
617 // Bionic power should not be negative!
618 if( power_level < 0_J ) {
619 power_level = 0_J;
620 }
621
622 JsonArray overmap_time_array = data.get_array( "overmap_time" );
623 overmap_time.clear();
624 while( overmap_time_array.has_more() ) {
625 point_abs_omt pt;
626 overmap_time_array.read_next( pt );
627 time_duration tdr = 0_turns;
628 overmap_time_array.read_next( tdr );
629 overmap_time[pt] = tdr;
630 }
631 data.read( "stomach", stomach );
632 data.read( "automoveroute", auto_move_route );
633
634 known_traps.clear();
635 for( JsonObject pmap : data.get_array( "known_traps" ) ) {
636 pmap.allow_omitted_members();
637 const tripoint p( pmap.get_int( "x" ), pmap.get_int( "y" ), pmap.get_int( "z" ) );
638 const std::string t = pmap.get_string( "trap" );
639 known_traps.insert( trap_map::value_type( p, t ) );
640 }
641}
642
643/**
644 * Load variables from json into object. These variables are common to both the avatar and NPCs.
645 */
646void Character::store( JsonOut &json ) const
647{
648 Creature::store( json );
649
650 // assumes already in Character object
651 // positional data
652 json.member( "posx", position.x );
653 json.member( "posy", position.y );
654 json.member( "posz", position.z );
655
656 // stat
657 json.member( "str_cur", str_cur );
658 json.member( "str_max", str_max );
659 json.member( "dex_cur", dex_cur );
660 json.member( "dex_max", dex_max );
661 json.member( "int_cur", int_cur );
662 json.member( "int_max", int_max );
663 json.member( "per_cur", per_cur );
664 json.member( "per_max", per_max );
665
666 json.member( "str_bonus", str_bonus );
667 json.member( "dex_bonus", dex_bonus );
668 json.member( "per_bonus", per_bonus );
669 json.member( "int_bonus", int_bonus );
670
671 json.member( "base_age", init_age );
672 json.member( "base_height", init_height );
673
674 if( prof.is_valid() ) {
675 json.member( "profession", prof );
676 }
677 json.member( "custom_profession", custom_profession );
678
679 // health
680 json.member( "healthy", healthy );
681 json.member( "healthy_mod", healthy_mod );
682 json.member( "healed_24h", healed_total );
683
684 // status
685 json.member( "temp_cur", temp_cur );
686 json.member( "temp_conv", temp_conv );
687 json.member( "frostbite_timer", frostbite_timer );
688 json.member( "body_wetness", body_wetness );
689
690 // needs
691 json.member( "thirst", thirst );
692 json.member( "fatigue", fatigue );
693 json.member( "sleep_deprivation", sleep_deprivation );
694 json.member( "stored_calories", stored_calories );
695 json.member( "radiation", radiation );
696 json.member( "stamina", stamina );
697 json.member( "vitamin_levels", vitamin_levels );
698 json.member( "pkill", pkill );
699 json.member( "omt_path", omt_path );
700 json.member( "consumption_history", consumption_history );
701
702 // crafting etc
703 json.member( "destination_activity", destination_activity );
704 json.member( "activity", activity );
705 json.member( "stashed_outbounds_activity", stashed_outbounds_activity );
706 json.member( "stashed_outbounds_backlog", stashed_outbounds_backlog );
707 json.member( "backlog", backlog );
708 json.member( "activity_vehicle_part_index", activity_vehicle_part_index ); // NPC activity
709
710 // handling for storing activity requirements
711 if( !backlog.empty() && !backlog.front().str_values.empty() && ( ( activity &&
712 activity.id() == activity_id( "ACT_FETCH_REQUIRED" ) ) || ( destination_activity &&
713 destination_activity.id() == activity_id( "ACT_FETCH_REQUIRED" ) ) ) ) {
714 requirement_data things_to_fetch = requirement_id( backlog.front().str_values.back() ).obj();
715 json.member( "fetch_data", things_to_fetch );
716 }
717
718 json.member( "stim", stim );
719 json.member( "type_of_scent", type_of_scent );
720
721 // breathing
722 json.member( "oxygen", oxygen );
723
724 // traits: permanent 'mutations' more or less
725 json.member( "traits", my_traits );
726 json.member( "mutations", my_mutations );
727 json.member( "magic", magic );
728 json.member( "martial_arts_data", martial_arts_data );
729 // "Fracking Toasters" - Saul Tigh, toaster
730 json.member( "my_bionics", *my_bionics );
731
732 json.member_as_string( "move_mode", move_mode );
733
734 // storing the mount
735 if( is_mounted() ) {
736 json.member( "mounted_creature", g->critter_tracker->temporary_id( *mounted_creature ) );
737 }
738
739 morale->store( json );
740
741 // skills
742 json.member( "skills" );
743 json.start_object();
744 for( const auto &pair : *_skills ) {
745 json.member( pair.first.str(), pair.second );
746 }
747 json.end_object();
748
749 // npc: unimplemented, potentially useful
750 json.member( "learned_recipes", *learned_recipes );
751 autolearn_skills_stamp->clear(); // Invalidates the cache
752
753 // npc; unimplemented
754 if( power_level < 1_kJ ) {
755 json.member( "power_level", std::to_string( units::to_joule( power_level ) ) + " J" );
756 } else {
757 json.member( "power_level", units::to_kilojoule( power_level ) );
758 }
759 json.member( "max_power_level", units::to_kilojoule( max_power_level ) );
760
761 if( !overmap_time.empty() ) {
762 json.member( "overmap_time" );
763 json.start_array();
764 for( const std::pair<const point_abs_omt, time_duration> &pr : overmap_time ) {
765 json.write( pr.first );
766 json.write( pr.second );
767 }
768 json.end_array();
769 }
770 json.member( "stomach", stomach );
771 json.member( "automoveroute", auto_move_route );
772 json.member( "known_traps" );
773 json.start_array();
774 for( const auto &elem : known_traps ) {
775 json.start_object();
776 json.member( "x", elem.first.x );
777 json.member( "y", elem.first.y );
778 json.member( "z", elem.first.z );
779 json.member( "trap", elem.second );
780 json.end_object();
781 }
782 json.end_array();
783}

788/**
789 * Gather variables for saving. These variables are common to both the avatar and npcs.
790 */
791void player::store( JsonOut &json ) const
792{
793 Character::store( json );
794
795 // energy
796 json.member( "last_sleep_check", last_sleep_check );
797 // misc levels
798 json.member( "tank_plut", tank_plut );
799 json.member( "reactor_plut", reactor_plut );
800 json.member( "slow_rad", slow_rad );
801 json.member( "scent", static_cast<int>( scent ) );
802
803 // gender
804 json.member( "male", male );
805
806 json.member( "cash", cash );
807 json.member( "recoil", recoil );
808 json.member( "in_vehicle", in_vehicle );
809 json.member( "id", getID() );
810
811 // potential incompatibility with future expansion
812 json.member( "damage_bandaged", damage_bandaged );
813 json.member( "damage_disinfected", damage_disinfected );
814 // "Looks like I picked the wrong week to quit smoking." - Steve McCroskey
815 json.member( "addictions", addictions );
816 json.member( "followers", follower_ids );
817
818 json.member( "worn", worn ); // also saves contents
819 json.member( "inv" );
820 inv.json_save_items( json );
821
822 if( !weapon.is_null() ) {
823 json.member( "weapon", weapon ); // also saves contents
824 }
825
826 if( const auto lt_ptr = last_target.lock() ) {
827 if( const npc *const guy = dynamic_cast<const npc *>( lt_ptr.get() ) ) {
828 json.member( "last_target", guy->getID() );
829 json.member( "last_target_type", +1 );
830 } else if( const monster *const mon = dynamic_cast<const monster *>( lt_ptr.get() ) ) {
831 // monsters don't have IDs, so get its index in the Creature_tracker instead
832 json.member( "last_target", g->critter_tracker->temporary_id( *mon ) );
833 json.member( "last_target_type", -1 );
834 }
835 } else {
836 json.member( "last_target_pos", last_target_pos );
837 }
838
839 json.member( "destination_point", destination_point );
840 json.member( "ammo_location", ammo_location );
841
842 // TODO: move to Character
843 json.member( "camps" );
844 json.start_array();
845 for( const tripoint_abs_omt &bcpt : camps ) {
846 json.start_object();
847 json.member( "pos", bcpt );
848 json.end_object();
849 }
850 json.end_array();
851}
852
853/**
854 * Load variables from json into object. These variables are common to both the avatar and NPCs.
855 */
856void player::load( const JsonObject &data )
857{
858 Character::load( data );
859
860 JsonArray parray;
861 character_id tmpid;
862
863 data.read( "tank_plut", tank_plut );
864 data.read( "reactor_plut", reactor_plut );
865 data.read( "slow_rad", slow_rad );
866 data.read( "scent", scent );
867 data.read( "male", male );
868 data.read( "cash", cash );
869 data.read( "recoil", recoil );
870 data.read( "in_vehicle", in_vehicle );
871 data.read( "last_sleep_check", last_sleep_check );
872 if( data.read( "id", tmpid ) && tmpid.is_valid() ) {
873 // Templates have invalid ids, so we only assign here when valid.
874 // When the game starts, a new valid id will be assigned if not already
875 // present.
876 setID( tmpid );
877 }
878
879 data.read( "addictions", addictions );
880 data.read( "followers", follower_ids );
881
882 // Add the earplugs.
883 if( has_bionic( bionic_id( "bio_ears" ) ) && !has_bionic( bionic_id( "bio_earplugs" ) ) ) {
884 add_bionic( bionic_id( "bio_earplugs" ) );
885 }
886
887 // Add the blindfold.
888 if( has_bionic( bionic_id( "bio_sunglasses" ) ) && !has_bionic( bionic_id( "bio_blindfold" ) ) ) {
889 add_bionic( bionic_id( "bio_blindfold" ) );
890 }
891
892 // Fixes bugged characters for CBM's preventing mutations.
893 for( const bionic_id &bid : get_bionics() ) {
894 for( const trait_id &mid : bid->canceled_mutations ) {
895 if( has_trait( mid ) ) {
896 remove_mutation( mid );
897 }
898 }
899 }
900
901 int tmptar;
902 int tmptartyp = 0;
903
904 data.read( "last_target", tmptar );
905 data.read( "last_target_type", tmptartyp );
906 data.read( "last_target_pos", last_target_pos );
907 data.read( "ammo_location", ammo_location );
908 if( tmptartyp == +1 ) {
909 // Use overmap_buffer because game::active_npc is not filled yet.
910 last_target = overmap_buffer.find_npc( character_id( tmptar ) );
911 } else if( tmptartyp == -1 ) {
912 // Need to do this *after* the monsters have been loaded!
913 last_target = g->critter_tracker->from_temporary_id( tmptar );
914 }
915 data.read( "destination_point", destination_point );
916 // TODO: move to Character
917 camps.clear();
918 for( JsonObject bcdata : data.get_array( "camps" ) ) {
919 bcdata.allow_omitted_members();
920 tripoint_abs_omt bcpt;
921 bcdata.read( "pos", bcpt );
922 camps.insert( bcpt );
923 }
924}

937
938void avatar::store( JsonOut &json ) const
939{
940 player::store( json );
941
942 if( g->scen != nullptr ) {
943 json.member( "scenario", g->scen->ident() );
944 }
945 // someday, npcs may drive
946 json.member( "controlling_vehicle", controlling_vehicle );
947
948 // shopping carts, furniture etc
949 json.member( "grab_point", grab_point );
950 json.member( "grab_type", obj_type_name[static_cast<int>( grab_type ) ] );
951
952 // misc player specific stuff
953 json.member( "focus_pool", focus_pool );
954
955 // stats through kills
956 json.member( "str_upgrade", std::abs( str_upgrade ) );
957 json.member( "dex_upgrade", std::abs( dex_upgrade ) );
958 json.member( "int_upgrade", std::abs( int_upgrade ) );
959 json.member( "per_upgrade", std::abs( per_upgrade ) );
960
961 // Player only, books they have read at least once.
962 json.member( "items_identified", items_identified );
963
964 json.member( "translocators", translocators );
965
966 // mission stuff
967 json.member( "active_mission", active_mission == nullptr ? -1 : active_mission->get_id() );
968
969 json.member( "active_missions", mission::to_uid_vector( active_missions ) );
970 json.member( "completed_missions", mission::to_uid_vector( completed_missions ) );
971 json.member( "failed_missions", mission::to_uid_vector( failed_missions ) );
972
973 json.member( "show_map_memory", show_map_memory );
974
975 json.member( "assigned_invlet" );
976 json.start_array();
977 for( auto iter : inv.assigned_invlet ) {
978 json.start_array();
979 json.write( iter.first );
980 json.write( iter.second );
981 json.end_array();
982 }
983 json.end_array();
984
985 json.member( "invcache" );
986 inv.json_save_invcache( json );
987
988 json.member( "preferred_aiming_mode", preferred_aiming_mode );
989
990 json.member( "faction_warnings" );
991 json.start_array();
992 for( const auto &elem : warning_record ) {
993 json.start_object();
994 json.member( "fac_warning_id", elem.first );
995 json.member( "fac_warning_num", elem.second.first );
996 json.member( "fac_warning_time", elem.second.second );
997 json.end_object();
998 }
999 json.end_array();
1000}

1008
1009void avatar::load( const JsonObject &data )
1010{
1011 player::load( data );
1012
1013 data.read( "controlling_vehicle", controlling_vehicle );
1014
1015 data.read( "grab_point", grab_point );
1016 std::string grab_typestr = "OBJECT_NONE";
1017 if( grab_point.x != 0 || grab_point.y != 0 ) {
1018 grab_typestr = "OBJECT_VEHICLE";
1019 data.read( "grab_type", grab_typestr );
1020 }
1021 const auto iter = std::find( obj_type_name.begin(), obj_type_name.end(), grab_typestr );
1022 grab( iter == obj_type_name.end() ?
1023 OBJECT_NONE : static_cast<object_type>( std::distance( obj_type_name.begin(), iter ) ),
1024 grab_point );
1025
1026 data.read( "focus_pool", focus_pool );
1027
1028 // stats through kills
1029 data.read( "str_upgrade", str_upgrade );
1030 data.read( "dex_upgrade", dex_upgrade );
1031 data.read( "int_upgrade", int_upgrade );
1032 data.read( "per_upgrade", per_upgrade );
1033
1034 // this is so we don't need to call get_option in a draw function
1035 if( !get_option<bool>( "STATS_THROUGH_KILLS" ) ) {
1036 str_upgrade = -str_upgrade;
1037 dex_upgrade = -dex_upgrade;
1038 int_upgrade = -int_upgrade;
1039 per_upgrade = -per_upgrade;
1040 }
1041
1042 data.read( "magic", magic );
1043
1044 set_highest_cat_level();
1045 drench_mut_calc();
1046 std::string scen_ident = "(null)";
1047 if( data.read( "scenario", scen_ident ) && string_id<scenario>( scen_ident ).is_valid() ) {
1048 g->scen = &string_id<scenario>( scen_ident ).obj();
1049
1050 if( !g->scen->allowed_start( start_location ) ) {
1051 start_location = g->scen->random_start_location();
1052 }
1053 } else {
1054 const scenario *generic_scenario = scenario::generic();
1055 // Only display error message if from a game file after scenarios existed.
1056 if( savegame_loading_version > 20 ) {
1057 debugmsg( "Tried to use non-existent scenario '%s'. Setting to generic '%s'.",
1058 scen_ident.c_str(), generic_scenario->ident().c_str() );
1059 }
1060 g->scen = generic_scenario;
1061 }
1062
1063 items_identified.clear();
1064 data.read( "items_identified", items_identified );
1065
1066 data.read( "translocators", translocators );
1067
1068 std::vector<int> tmpmissions;
1069 if( data.read( "active_missions", tmpmissions ) ) {
1070 active_missions = mission::to_ptr_vector( tmpmissions );
1071 }
1072 if( data.read( "failed_missions", tmpmissions ) ) {
1073 failed_missions = mission::to_ptr_vector( tmpmissions );
1074 }
1075 if( data.read( "completed_missions", tmpmissions ) ) {
1076 completed_missions = mission::to_ptr_vector( tmpmissions );
1077 }
1078
1079 int tmpactive_mission = 0;
1080 if( data.read( "active_mission", tmpactive_mission ) ) {
1081 if( savegame_loading_version <= 23 ) {
1082 // In 0.C, active_mission was an index of the active_missions array (-1 indicated no active mission).
1083 // And it would as often as not be out of bounds (e.g. when a questgiver died).
1084 // Later, it became a mission * and stored as the mission's uid, and this change broke backward compatibility.
1085 // Unfortunately, nothing can be done about savegames between the bump to version 24 and 83808a941.
1086 if( tmpactive_mission >= 0 && tmpactive_mission < static_cast<int>( active_missions.size() ) ) {
1087 active_mission = active_missions[tmpactive_mission];
1088 } else if( !active_missions.empty() ) {
1089 active_mission = active_missions.back();
1090 }
1091 } else if( tmpactive_mission != -1 ) {
1092 active_mission = mission::find( tmpactive_mission );
1093 }
1094 }
1095
1096 // Normally there is only one player character loaded, so if a mission that is assigned to
1097 // another character (not the current one) fails, the other character(s) are not informed.
1098 // We must inform them when they get loaded the next time.
1099 // Only active missions need checking, failed/complete will not change anymore.
1100 const auto last = std::remove_if( active_missions.begin(),
1101 active_missions.end(), []( mission const * m ) {
1102 return m->has_failed();
1103 } );
1104 std::copy( last, active_missions.end(), std::back_inserter( failed_missions ) );
1105 active_missions.erase( last, active_missions.end() );
1106 if( active_mission && active_mission->has_failed() ) {
1107 if( active_missions.empty() ) {
1108 active_mission = nullptr;
1109 } else {
1110 active_mission = active_missions.front();
1111 }
1112 }
1113
1114 if( savegame_loading_version <= 23 && is_player() ) {
1115 // In 0.C there was no player_id member of mission, so it'll be the default -1.
1116 // When the member was introduced, no steps were taken to ensure compatibility with 0.C, so
1117 // missions will be buggy for saves between experimental commits bd2088c033 and dd83800.
1118 // see npc_chatbin::check_missions and npc::talk_to_u
1119 for( mission *miss : active_missions ) {
1120 miss->set_player_id_legacy_0c( getID() );
1121 }
1122 }
1123
1124 data.read( "show_map_memory", show_map_memory );
1125
1126 for( JsonArray pair : data.get_array( "assigned_invlet" ) ) {
1127 inv.assigned_invlet[static_cast<char>( pair.get_int( 0 ) )] =
1128 itype_id( pair.get_string( 1 ) );
1129 }
1130
1131 if( data.has_member( "invcache" ) ) {
1132 JsonIn *jip = data.get_raw( "invcache" );
1133 inv.json_load_invcache( *jip );
1134 }
1135
1136 data.read( "preferred_aiming_mode", preferred_aiming_mode );
1137
1138 if( data.has_array( "faction_warnings" ) ) {
1139 for( JsonObject warning_data : data.get_array( "faction_warnings" ) ) {
1140 warning_data.allow_omitted_members();
1141 std::string fac_id = warning_data.get_string( "fac_warning_id" );
1142 int warning_num = warning_data.get_int( "fac_warning_num" );
1143 time_point warning_time = calendar::before_time_starts;
1144 warning_data.read( "fac_warning_time", warning_time );
1145 warning_record[faction_id( fac_id )] = std::make_pair( warning_num, warning_time );
1146 }
1147 }
1148}

1150////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1151///// npc.h
1152
1153void npc_follower_rules::serialize( JsonOut &json ) const
1154{
1155 json.start_object();
1156 json.member( "engagement", static_cast<int>( engagement ) );
1157 json.member( "aim", static_cast<int>( aim ) );
1158 json.member( "cbm_reserve", static_cast<int>( cbm_reserve ) );
1159 json.member( "cbm_recharge", static_cast<int>( cbm_recharge ) );
1160
1161 // serialize the flags so they can be changed between save games
1162 for( const auto &rule : ally_rule_strs ) {
1163 json.member( "rule_" + rule.first, has_flag( rule.second.rule, false ) );
1164 }
1165 for( const auto &rule : ally_rule_strs ) {
1166 json.member( "override_enable_" + rule.first, has_override_enable( rule.second.rule ) );
1167 }
1168 for( const auto &rule : ally_rule_strs ) {
1169 json.member( "override_" + rule.first, has_override( rule.second.rule ) );
1170 }
1171
1172 json.member( "pickup_whitelist", *pickup_whitelist );
1173
1174 json.end_object();
1175}
1176
1177void npc_follower_rules::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
1178{
1179 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
1180 data.allow_omitted_members();
1181 int tmpeng = 0;
1182 data.read( "engagement", tmpeng );
1183 engagement = static_cast<combat_engagement>( tmpeng );
1184 int tmpaim = 0;
1185 data.read( "aim", tmpaim );
1186 aim = static_cast<aim_rule>( tmpaim );
1187 int tmpreserve = 50;
1188 data.read( "cbm_reserve", tmpreserve );
1189 cbm_reserve = static_cast<cbm_reserve_rule>( tmpreserve );
1190 int tmprecharge = 50;
1191 data.read( "cbm_recharge", tmprecharge );
1192 cbm_recharge = static_cast<cbm_recharge_rule>( tmprecharge );
1193
1194 // deserialize the flags so they can be changed between save games
1195 for( const auto &rule : ally_rule_strs ) {
1196 bool tmpflag = false;
1197 // legacy to handle rules that were saved before overrides
1198 data.read( rule.first, tmpflag );
1199 if( tmpflag ) {
1200 set_flag( rule.second.rule );
1201 } else {
1202 clear_flag( rule.second.rule );
1203 }
1204 data.read( "rule_" + rule.first, tmpflag );
1205 if( tmpflag ) {
1206 set_flag( rule.second.rule );
1207 } else {
1208 clear_flag( rule.second.rule );
1209 }
1210 data.read( "override_enable_" + rule.first, tmpflag );
1211 if( tmpflag ) {
1212 enable_override( rule.second.rule );
1213 } else {
1214 disable_override( rule.second.rule );
1215 }
1216 data.read( "override_" + rule.first, tmpflag );
1217 if( tmpflag ) {
1218 set_override( rule.second.rule );
1219 } else {
1220 clear_override( rule.second.rule );
1221 }
1222
1223 // This and the following two entries are for legacy save game handling.
1224 // "avoid_combat" was renamed "follow_close" to better reflect behavior.
1225 if( data.has_member( "rule_avoid_combat" ) ) {
1226 data.read( "rule_avoid_combat", tmpflag );
1227 if( tmpflag ) {
1228 set_flag( ally_rule::follow_close );
1229 } else {
1230 clear_flag( ally_rule::follow_close );
1231 }
1232 }
1233 if( data.has_member( "override_enable_avoid_combat" ) ) {
1234 data.read( "override_enable_avoid_combat", tmpflag );
1235 if( tmpflag ) {
1236 enable_override( ally_rule::follow_close );
1237 } else {
1238 disable_override( ally_rule::follow_close );
1239 }
1240 }
1241 if( data.has_member( "override_avoid_combat" ) ) {
1242 data.read( "override_avoid_combat", tmpflag );
1243 if( tmpflag ) {
1244 set_override( ally_rule::follow_close );
1245 } else {
1246 clear_override( ally_rule::follow_close );
1247 }
1248 }
1249 }
1250
1251 data.read( "pickup_whitelist", *pickup_whitelist );
1252}
1253
1254void npc_chatbin::serialize( JsonOut &json ) const
1255{
1256 json.start_object();
1257 json.member( "first_topic", first_topic );
1258 if( mission_selected != nullptr ) {
1259 json.member( "mission_selected", mission_selected->get_id() );
1260 }
1261 json.member( "skill", skill );
1262 json.member( "style", style );
1263 json.member( "missions", mission::to_uid_vector( missions ) );
1264 json.member( "missions_assigned", mission::to_uid_vector( missions_assigned ) );
1265 json.end_object();
1266}
1267
1268void npc_chatbin::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
1269{
1270 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
1271 data.allow_omitted_members();
1272
1273 if( data.has_int( "first_topic" ) ) {
1274 int tmptopic = 0;
1275 data.read( "first_topic", tmptopic );
1276 first_topic = convert_talk_topic( static_cast<talk_topic_enum>( tmptopic ) );
1277 } else {
1278 data.read( "first_topic", first_topic );
1279 }
1280
1281 data.read( "skill", skill );
1282 data.read( "style", style );
1283
1284 std::vector<int> tmpmissions;
1285 data.read( "missions", tmpmissions );
1286 missions = mission::to_ptr_vector( tmpmissions );
1287 std::vector<int> tmpmissions_assigned;
1288 data.read( "missions_assigned", tmpmissions_assigned );
1289 missions_assigned = mission::to_ptr_vector( tmpmissions_assigned );
1290
1291 int tmpmission_selected = 0;
1292 mission_selected = nullptr;
1293 if( data.read( "mission_selected", tmpmission_selected ) && tmpmission_selected != -1 ) {
1294 if( savegame_loading_version <= 23 ) {
1295 // In 0.C, it was an index into the missions_assigned vector
1296 if( tmpmission_selected >= 0 &&
1297 tmpmission_selected < static_cast<int>( missions_assigned.size() ) ) {
1298 mission_selected = missions_assigned[tmpmission_selected];
1299 }
1300 } else {
1301 mission_selected = mission::find( tmpmission_selected );
1302 }
1303 }
1304}
1305
1306void npc_personality::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
1307{
1308 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
1309 data.allow_omitted_members();
1310 int tmpagg = 0;
1311 int tmpbrav = 0;
1312 int tmpcol = 0;
1313 int tmpalt = 0;
1314 if( data.read( "aggression", tmpagg ) &&
1315 data.read( "bravery", tmpbrav ) &&
1316 data.read( "collector", tmpcol ) &&
1317 data.read( "altruism", tmpalt ) ) {
1318 aggression = static_cast<signed char>( tmpagg );
1319 bravery = static_cast<signed char>( tmpbrav );
1320 collector = static_cast<signed char>( tmpcol );
1321 altruism = static_cast<signed char>( tmpalt );
1322 } else {
1323 debugmsg( "npc_personality: bad data" );
1324 }
1325}

1330 json.member( "aggression", static_cast<int>( aggression ) );
1331 json.member( "bravery", static_cast<int>( bravery ) );
1332 json.member( "collector", static_cast<int>( collector ) );
1333 json.member( "altruism", static_cast<int>( altruism ) );
1334 json.end_object();
1335}

1400/*
1401 * load npc
1402 */
1403void npc::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
1404{
1405 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
1406 load( data );
1407}
1408
1409void npc::load( const JsonObject &data )
1410{
1411 player::load( data );
1412
1413 int misstmp = 0;
1414 int classtmp = 0;
1415 int atttmp = 0;
1416 std::string facID;
1417 std::string comp_miss_id;
1418 std::string comp_miss_role;
1419 tripoint_abs_omt comp_miss_pt;
1420 std::string classid;
1421 std::string companion_mission_role;
1422 time_point companion_mission_t = calendar::start_of_cataclysm;
1423 time_point companion_mission_t_r = calendar::start_of_cataclysm;
1424 std::string act_id;
1425
1426 data.read( "name", name );
1427 data.read( "marked_for_death", marked_for_death );
1428 data.read( "dead", dead );
1429 data.read( "patience", patience );
1430 if( data.has_number( "myclass" ) ) {
1431 data.read( "myclass", classtmp );
1432 myclass = npc_class::from_legacy_int( classtmp );
1433 } else if( data.has_string( "myclass" ) ) {
1434 data.read( "myclass", classid );
1435 myclass = npc_class_id( classid );
1436 }
1437 data.read( "known_to_u", known_to_u );
1438 data.read( "personality", personality );
1439 if( !data.read( "submap_coords", submap_coords ) ) {
1440 // Old submap coordinates are for the point (0, 0, 0) on local map
1441 // New ones are for submap that contains pos
1442 point old_coords;
1443 data.read( "mapx", old_coords.x );
1444 data.read( "mapy", old_coords.y );
1445 int o = 0;
1446 if( data.read( "omx", o ) ) {
1447 old_coords.x += o * OMAPX * 2;
1448 }
1449 if( data.read( "omy", o ) ) {
1450 old_coords.y += o * OMAPY * 2;
1451 }
1452 submap_coords = old_coords + point( posx() / SEEX, posy() / SEEY );
1453 }
1454
1455 if( !data.read( "mapz", position.z ) ) {
1456 data.read( "omz", position.z ); // omz/mapz got moved to position.z
1457 }
1458
1459 if( data.has_member( "plx" ) ) {
1460 last_player_seen_pos.emplace();
1461 data.read( "plx", last_player_seen_pos->x );
1462 data.read( "ply", last_player_seen_pos->y );
1463 if( !data.read( "plz", last_player_seen_pos->z ) ) {
1464 last_player_seen_pos->z = posz();
1465 }
1466 // old code used tripoint_min to indicate "not a valid point"
1467 if( *last_player_seen_pos == tripoint_min ) {
1468 last_player_seen_pos.reset();
1469 }
1470 } else {
1471 data.read( "last_player_seen_pos", last_player_seen_pos );
1472 }
1473
1474 data.read( "goalx", goal.x() );
1475 data.read( "goaly", goal.y() );
1476 data.read( "goalz", goal.z() );
1477
1478 data.read( "guardx", guard_pos.x );
1479 data.read( "guardy", guard_pos.y );
1480 data.read( "guardz", guard_pos.z );
1481 if( data.read( "current_activity_id", act_id ) ) {
1482 current_activity_id = activity_id( act_id );
1483 } else if( activity ) {
1484 current_activity_id = activity.id();
1485 }
1486
1487 if( data.has_member( "pulp_locationx" ) ) {
1488 pulp_location.emplace();
1489 data.read( "pulp_locationx", pulp_location->x );
1490 data.read( "pulp_locationy", pulp_location->y );
1491 data.read( "pulp_locationz", pulp_location->z );
1492 // old code used tripoint_min to indicate "not a valid point"
1493 if( *pulp_location == tripoint_min ) {
1494 pulp_location.reset();
1495 }
1496 } else {
1497 data.read( "pulp_location", pulp_location );
1498 }
1499 data.read( "assigned_camp", assigned_camp );
1500 data.read( "chair_pos", chair_pos );
1501 data.read( "wander_pos", wander_pos );
1502 data.read( "job", job );
1503 if( data.read( "mission", misstmp ) ) {
1504 mission = static_cast<npc_mission>( misstmp );
1505 static const std::set<npc_mission> legacy_missions = {{
1506 NPC_MISSION_LEGACY_1, NPC_MISSION_LEGACY_2,
1507 NPC_MISSION_LEGACY_3
1508 }
1509 };
1510 if( legacy_missions.count( mission ) > 0 ) {
1511 mission = NPC_MISSION_NULL;
1512 }
1513 }
1514 if( data.read( "previous_mission", misstmp ) ) {
1515 previous_mission = static_cast<npc_mission>( misstmp );
1516 static const std::set<npc_mission> legacy_missions = {{
1517 NPC_MISSION_LEGACY_1, NPC_MISSION_LEGACY_2,
1518 NPC_MISSION_LEGACY_3
1519 }
1520 };
1521 if( legacy_missions.count( mission ) > 0 ) {
1522 previous_mission = NPC_MISSION_NULL;
1523 }
1524 }
1525
1526 if( data.read( "my_fac", facID ) ) {
1527 fac_id = faction_id( facID );
1528 }
1529 int temp_fac_api_ver = 0;
1530 if( data.read( "faction_api_ver", temp_fac_api_ver ) ) {
1531 faction_api_version = temp_fac_api_ver;
1532 } else {
1533 faction_api_version = 0;
1534 }
1535
1536 if( data.read( "attitude", atttmp ) ) {
1537 attitude = static_cast<npc_attitude>( atttmp );
1538 static const std::set<npc_attitude> legacy_attitudes = {{
1539 NPCATT_LEGACY_1, NPCATT_LEGACY_2, NPCATT_LEGACY_3,
1540 NPCATT_LEGACY_4, NPCATT_LEGACY_5, NPCATT_LEGACY_6
1541 }
1542 };
1543 if( legacy_attitudes.count( attitude ) > 0 ) {
1544 attitude = NPCATT_NULL;
1545 }
1546 }
1547 if( data.read( "previous_attitude", atttmp ) ) {
1548 previous_attitude = static_cast<npc_attitude>( atttmp );
1549 static const std::set<npc_attitude> legacy_attitudes = {{
1550 NPCATT_LEGACY_1, NPCATT_LEGACY_2, NPCATT_LEGACY_3,
1551 NPCATT_LEGACY_4, NPCATT_LEGACY_5, NPCATT_LEGACY_6
1552 }
1553 };
1554 if( legacy_attitudes.count( attitude ) > 0 ) {
1555 previous_attitude = NPCATT_NULL;
1556 }
1557 }
1558
1559 if( data.read( "comp_mission_id", comp_miss_id ) ) {
1560 comp_mission.mission_id = comp_miss_id;
1561 }
1562
1563 if( data.read( "comp_mission_pt", comp_miss_pt ) ) {
1564 comp_mission.position = comp_miss_pt;
1565 }
1566
1567 if( data.read( "comp_mission_role", comp_miss_role ) ) {
1568 comp_mission.role_id = comp_miss_role;
1569 }
1570
1571 if( data.read( "companion_mission_role_id", companion_mission_role ) ) {
1572 companion_mission_role_id = companion_mission_role;
1573 }
1574
1575 std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> companion_mission_pts;
1576 data.read( "companion_mission_points", companion_mission_pts );
1577 if( !companion_mission_pts.empty() ) {
1578 for( auto pt : companion_mission_pts ) {
1579 companion_mission_points.push_back( pt );
1580 }
1581 }
1582
1583 if( !data.read( "companion_mission_time", companion_mission_t ) ) {
1584 companion_mission_time = calendar::before_time_starts;
1585 } else {
1586 companion_mission_time = companion_mission_t;
1587 }
1588
1589 if( !data.read( "companion_mission_time_ret", companion_mission_t_r ) ) {
1590 companion_mission_time_ret = calendar::before_time_starts;
1591 } else {
1592 companion_mission_time_ret = companion_mission_t_r;
1593 }
1594
1595 companion_mission_inv.clear();
1596 if( data.has_member( "companion_mission_inv" ) ) {
1597 JsonIn *invin_mission = data.get_raw( "companion_mission_inv" );
1598 companion_mission_inv.json_load_items( *invin_mission );
1599 }
1600
1601 if( !data.read( "restock", restock ) ) {
1602 restock = calendar::before_time_starts;
1603 }
1604
1605 data.read( "op_of_u", op_of_u );
1606 data.read( "chatbin", chatbin );
1607 if( !data.read( "rules", rules ) ) {
1608 data.read( "misc_rules", rules );
1609 data.read( "combat_rules", rules );
1610 }
1611 real_weapon = item( "null", calendar::start_of_cataclysm );
1612 data.read( "real_weapon", real_weapon );
1613 cbm_weapon_index = -1;
1614 data.read( "cbm_weapon_index", cbm_weapon_index );
1615
1616 if( !data.read( "last_updated", last_updated ) ) {
1617 last_updated = calendar::turn;
1618 }
1619 complaints.clear();
1620 data.read( "complaints", complaints );
1621}
1622
1623/*
1624 * save npc
1625 */
1626void npc::serialize( JsonOut &json ) const
1627{
1628 json.start_object();
1629 // This must be after the json object has been started, so any super class
1630 // puts their data into the same json object.
1631 store( json );
1632 json.end_object();
1633}
1634
1635void npc::store( JsonOut &json ) const
1636{
1637 player::store( json );
1638
1639 json.member( "name", name );
1640 json.member( "marked_for_death", marked_for_death );
1641 json.member( "dead", dead );
1642 json.member( "patience", patience );
1643 json.member( "myclass", myclass.str() );
1644 json.member( "known_to_u", known_to_u );
1645 json.member( "personality", personality );
1646
1647 json.member( "submap_coords", submap_coords );
1648
1649 json.member( "last_player_seen_pos", last_player_seen_pos );
1650
1651 json.member( "goalx", goal.x() );
1652 json.member( "goaly", goal.y() );
1653 json.member( "goalz", goal.z() );
1654
1655 json.member( "guardx", guard_pos.x );
1656 json.member( "guardy", guard_pos.y );
1657 json.member( "guardz", guard_pos.z );
1658 json.member( "current_activity_id", current_activity_id.str() );
1659 json.member( "pulp_location", pulp_location );
1660 json.member( "assigned_camp", assigned_camp );
1661 json.member( "chair_pos", chair_pos );
1662 json.member( "wander_pos", wander_pos );
1663 json.member( "job", job );
1664 // TODO: stringid
1665 json.member( "mission", mission );
1666 json.member( "previous_mission", previous_mission );
1667 json.member( "faction_api_ver", faction_api_version );
1668 if( !fac_id.str().empty() ) { // set in constructor
1669 json.member( "my_fac", fac_id.c_str() );
1670 }
1671 json.member( "attitude", static_cast<int>( attitude ) );
1672 json.member( "previous_attitude", static_cast<int>( previous_attitude ) );
1673 json.member( "op_of_u", op_of_u );
1674 json.member( "chatbin", chatbin );
1675 json.member( "rules", rules );
1676
1677 if( !real_weapon.is_null() ) {
1678 json.member( "real_weapon", real_weapon ); // also saves contents
1679 }
1680 json.member( "cbm_weapon_index", cbm_weapon_index );
1681
1682 json.member( "comp_mission_id", comp_mission.mission_id );
1683 json.member( "comp_mission_pt", comp_mission.position );
1684 json.member( "comp_mission_role", comp_mission.role_id );
1685 json.member( "companion_mission_role_id", companion_mission_role_id );
1686 json.member( "companion_mission_points", companion_mission_points );
1687 json.member( "companion_mission_time", companion_mission_time );
1688 json.member( "companion_mission_time_ret", companion_mission_time_ret );
1689 json.member( "companion_mission_inv" );
1690 companion_mission_inv.json_save_items( json );
1691 json.member( "restock", restock );
1692
1693 json.member( "last_updated", last_updated );
1694 json.member( "complaints", complaints );
1695}
1696
1697////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1698///// inventory.h
1699/*
1700 * Save invlet cache
1701 */
1702void inventory::json_save_invcache( JsonOut &json ) const
1703{
1704 json.start_array();
1705 for( const auto &elem : invlet_cache.get_invlets_by_id() ) {
1706 json.start_object();
1707 json.member( elem.first.str() );
1708 json.start_array();
1709 for( const auto &_sym : elem.second ) {
1710 json.write( static_cast<int>( _sym ) );
1711 }
1712 json.end_array();
1713 json.end_object();
1714 }
1715 json.end_array();
1716}
1717
1718/*
1719 * Invlet cache: player specific, thus not wrapped in inventory::json_load/save
1720 */
1721void inventory::json_load_invcache( JsonIn &jsin )
1722{
1723 try {
1724 std::unordered_map<itype_id, std::string> map;
1725 for( JsonObject jo : jsin.get_array() ) {
1726 jo.allow_omitted_members();
1727 for( const JsonMember member : jo ) {
1728 std::string invlets;
1729 for( const int i : member.get_array() ) {
1730 invlets.push_back( i );
1731 }
1732 map[itype_id( member.name() )] = invlets;
1733 }
1734 }
1735 invlet_cache = { map };
1736 } catch( const JsonError &jsonerr ) {
1737 debugmsg( "bad invcache json:\n%s", jsonerr.c_str() );
1738 }
1739}
1740
1741/*
1742 * save all items. Just this->items, invlet cache saved separately
1743 */
1744void inventory::json_save_items( JsonOut &json ) const
1745{
1746 json.start_array();
1747 for( const auto &elem : items ) {
1748 for( const auto &elem_stack_iter : elem ) {
1749 elem_stack_iter.serialize( json );
1750 }
1751 }
1752 json.end_array();
1753}
1754
1755void inventory::json_load_items( JsonIn &jsin )
1756{
1757 jsin.start_array();
1758 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
1759 item tmp;
1760 tmp.deserialize( jsin );
1761 add_item( tmp, true, false );
1762 }
1763}
1764
1765////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1766///// monster.h
1767
1768void monster::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
1769{
1770 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
1771 data.allow_omitted_members();
1772 load( data );
1773}
1774
1775void monster::load( const JsonObject &data )
1776{
1777 Creature::load( data );
1778
1779 std::string sidtmp;
1780 // load->str->int
1781 data.read( "typeid", sidtmp );
1782 type = &mtype_id( sidtmp ).obj();
1783
1784 data.read( "unique_name", unique_name );
1785 data.read( "posx", position.x );
1786 data.read( "posy", position.y );
1787 if( !data.read( "posz", position.z ) ) {
1788 position.z = g->get_levz();
1789 }
1790
1791 data.read( "wandf", wandf );
1792 data.read( "wandx", wander_pos.x );
1793 data.read( "wandy", wander_pos.y );
1794 if( data.read( "wandz", wander_pos.z ) ) {
1795 wander_pos.z = position.z;
1796 }
1797 if( data.has_object( "tied_item" ) ) {
1798 JsonIn *tied_item_json = data.get_raw( "tied_item" );
1799 item newitem;
1800 newitem.deserialize( *tied_item_json );
1801 tied_item = cata::make_value<item>( newitem );
1802 }
1803 if( data.has_object( "tack_item" ) ) {
1804 JsonIn *tack_item_json = data.get_raw( "tack_item" );
1805 item newitem;
1806 newitem.deserialize( *tack_item_json );
1807 tack_item = cata::make_value<item>( newitem );
1808 }
1809 if( data.has_object( "armor_item" ) ) {
1810 JsonIn *armor_item_json = data.get_raw( "armor_item" );
1811 item newitem;
1812 newitem.deserialize( *armor_item_json );
1813 armor_item = cata::make_value<item>( newitem );
1814 }
1815 if( data.has_object( "storage_item" ) ) {
1816 JsonIn *storage_item_json = data.get_raw( "storage_item" );
1817 item newitem;
1818 newitem.deserialize( *storage_item_json );
1819 storage_item = cata::make_value<item>( newitem );
1820 }
1821 if( data.has_object( "battery_item" ) ) {
1822 JsonIn *battery_item_json = data.get_raw( "battery_item" );
1823 item newitem;
1824 newitem.deserialize( *battery_item_json );
1825 battery_item = cata::make_value<item>( newitem );
1826 }
1827 data.read( "hp", hp );
1828
1829 // sp_timeout indicates an old save, prior to the special_attacks refactor
1830 if( data.has_array( "sp_timeout" ) ) {
1831 JsonArray parray = data.get_array( "sp_timeout" );
1832 size_t index = 0;
1833 int ptimeout = 0;
1834 while( parray.has_more() && index < type->special_attacks_names.size() ) {
1835 if( parray.read_next( ptimeout ) ) {
1836 // assume timeouts saved in same order as current monsters.json listing
1837 const std::string &aname = type->special_attacks_names[index++];
1838 auto &entry = special_attacks[aname];
1839 if( ptimeout >= 0 ) {
1840 entry.cooldown = ptimeout;
1841 } else { // -1 means disabled, unclear what <-1 values mean in old saves
1842 entry.cooldown = type->special_attacks.at( aname )->cooldown;
1843 entry.enabled = false;
1844 }
1845 }
1846 }
1847 }
1848
1849 // special_attacks indicates a save after the special_attacks refactor
1850 if( data.has_object( "special_attacks" ) ) {
1851 for( const JsonMember member : data.get_object( "special_attacks" ) ) {
1852 JsonObject saobject = member.get_object();
1853 saobject.allow_omitted_members();
1854 auto &entry = special_attacks[member.name()];
1855 entry.cooldown = saobject.get_int( "cooldown" );
1856 entry.enabled = saobject.get_bool( "enabled" );
1857 }
1858 }
1859
1860 // make sure the loaded monster has every special attack its type says it should have
1861 for( auto &sa : type->special_attacks ) {
1862 const std::string &aname = sa.first;
1863 if( special_attacks.find( aname ) == special_attacks.end() ) {
1864 auto &entry = special_attacks[aname];
1865 entry.cooldown = rng( 0, sa.second->cooldown );
1866 }
1867 }
1868
1869 data.read( "friendly", friendly );
1870 data.read( "mission_id", mission_id );
1871 data.read( "no_extra_death_drops", no_extra_death_drops );
1872 data.read( "dead", dead );
1873 data.read( "anger", anger );
1874 data.read( "morale", morale );
1875 data.read( "hallucination", hallucination );
1876 data.read( "stairscount", staircount ); // really?
1877 data.read( "fish_population", fish_population );
1878 // Load legacy plans.
1879 std::vector<tripoint> plans;
1880 data.read( "plans", plans );
1881 if( !plans.empty() ) {
1882 goal = plans.back();
1883 }
1884
1885 data.read( "summon_time_limit", summon_time_limit );
1886
1887 // This is relative to the monster so it isn't invalidated by map shifting.
1888 tripoint destination;
1889 data.read( "destination", destination );
1890 goal = pos() + destination;
1891
1892 upgrades = data.get_bool( "upgrades", type->upgrades );
1893 upgrade_time = data.get_int( "upgrade_time", -1 );
1894
1895 reproduces = data.get_bool( "reproduces", type->reproduces );
1896 baby_timer.reset();
1897 data.read( "baby_timer", baby_timer );
1898 if( baby_timer && *baby_timer == calendar::before_time_starts ) {
1899 baby_timer.reset();
1900 }
1901
1902 data.read( "udder_timer", udder_timer );
1903
1904 horde_attraction = static_cast<monster_horde_attraction>( data.get_int( "horde_attraction", 0 ) );
1905
1906 data.read( "inv", inv );
1907 data.read( "corpse_components", corpse_components );
1908 data.read( "dragged_foe_id", dragged_foe_id );
1909
1910 if( data.has_int( "ammo" ) && !type->starting_ammo.empty() ) {
1911 // Legacy loading for ammo.
1912 normalize_ammo( data.get_int( "ammo" ) );
1913 } else {
1914 data.read( "ammo", ammo );
1915 // legacy loading for milkable creatures, fix mismatch.
1916 if( has_flag( MF_MILKABLE ) && !type->starting_ammo.empty() && !ammo.empty() &&
1917 type->starting_ammo.begin()->first != ammo.begin()->first ) {
1918 const itype_id old_type = ammo.begin()->first;
1919 const int old_value = ammo.begin()->second;
1920 ammo[type->starting_ammo.begin()->first] = old_value;
1921 ammo.erase( old_type );
1922 }
1923 }
1924
1925 faction = mfaction_str_id( data.get_string( "faction", "" ) );
1926 if( !data.read( "last_updated", last_updated ) ) {
1927 last_updated = calendar::turn;
1928 }
1929 data.read( "mounted_player_id", mounted_player_id );
1930 data.read( "path", path );
1931}
1932
1933/*
1934 * Save, json ed; serialization that won't break as easily. In theory.
1935 */
1936void monster::serialize( JsonOut &json ) const
1937{
1938 json.start_object();
1939 // This must be after the json object has been started, so any super class
1940 // puts their data into the same json object.
1941 store( json );
1942 json.end_object();
1943}

1945void monster::store( JsonOut &json ) const
1946{

1949 json.member( "unique_name", unique_name );
1950 json.member( "posx", position.x );
1951 json.member( "posy", position.y );
1952 json.member( "posz", position.z );
1953 json.member( "wandx", wander_pos.x );
1954 json.member( "wandy", wander_pos.y );
1955 json.member( "wandz", wander_pos.z );
1956 json.member( "wandf", wandf );
1957 json.member( "hp", hp );
1958 json.member( "special_attacks", special_attacks );
1959 json.member( "friendly", friendly );
1960 json.member( "fish_population", fish_population );
1961 json.member( "faction", faction.id().str() );
1962 json.member( "mission_id", mission_id );
1963 json.member( "no_extra_death_drops", no_extra_death_drops );
1964 json.member( "dead", dead );
1965 json.member( "anger", anger );
1966 json.member( "morale", morale );
1967 json.member( "hallucination", hallucination );
1968 json.member( "stairscount", staircount );
1969 if( tied_item ) {
1970 json.member( "tied_item", *tied_item );
1971 }
1972 if( tack_item ) {
1973 json.member( "tack_item", *tack_item );
1974 }
1975 if( armor_item ) {
1976 json.member( "armor_item", *armor_item );
1977 }
1978 if( storage_item ) {
1979 json.member( "storage_item", *storage_item );
1980 }
1981 if( battery_item ) {
1982 json.member( "battery_item", *battery_item );
1983 }
1984 // Store the relative position of the goal so it loads correctly after a map shift.
1985 json.member( "destination", goal - pos() );
1986 json.member( "ammo", ammo );
1987 json.member( "upgrades", upgrades );
1988 json.member( "upgrade_time", upgrade_time );
1989 json.member( "last_updated", last_updated );
1990 json.member( "reproduces", reproduces );
1991 json.member( "baby_timer", baby_timer );
1992 json.member( "udder_timer", udder_timer );
1993
1994 json.member( "summon_time_limit", summon_time_limit );
1995
1996 if( horde_attraction > MHA_NULL && horde_attraction < NUM_MONSTER_HORDE_ATTRACTION ) {
1997 json.member( "horde_attraction", horde_attraction );
1998 }
1999 json.member( "inv", inv );
2000 json.member( "corpse_components", corpse_components );
2001
2002 json.member( "dragged_foe_id", dragged_foe_id );
2003 // storing the rider
2004 json.member( "mounted_player_id", mounted_player_id );
2005 json.member( "path", path );
2006}

2069// Template parameter because item::craft_data is private and I don't want to make it public.
2070template<typename T>
2071static void load_legacy_craft_data( io::JsonObjectInputArchive &archive, T &value )
2072{
2073 archive.allow_omitted_members();
2074 if( archive.has_member( "making" ) ) {
2075 value = cata::make_value<typename T::element_type>();
2076 value->deserialize( archive );
2077 }
2078}

2082static void load_legacy_craft_data( io::JsonObjectOutputArchive &, T & )
2083{
2084}

2086namespace charge_removal_blacklist
2087{
2088static std::set<itype_id> removal_list;
2089
2090const std::set<itype_id> &get()
2091{
2092 return removal_list;
2093}
2094void load( const JsonObject &jo )
2095{
2096 std::set<std::string> d = jo.get_tags( "list" );
2097 for( const std::string &s : d ) {
2098 removal_list.insert( itype_id( s ) );
2099 }
2100}
2101void reset()
2102{
2103 removal_list.clear();
2104}
2105} // namespace charge_removal_blacklist
2106
2107namespace to_cbc_migration
2108{
2109static std::set<itype_id> the_list;
2110
2111void load( const JsonObject &jo )
2112{
2113 std::set<std::string> d = jo.get_tags( "list" );
2114 for( const std::string &s : d ) {
2115 the_list.insert( itype_id( s ) );
2116 }
2117}
2118
2119void reset()
2120{
2121 the_list.clear();
2122}
2123
2124static bool migration_required( const item &i )
2125{
2126 if( !i.count_by_charges() ) {
2127 return false;
2128 }
2129 return the_list.count( i.typeId() ) > 0;
2130}
2131
2132/**
2133 * Merge old individual items into new count-by-charges items with same id.
2134 */
2135static void migrate( cata::colony<item> &stack )
2136{
2137 for( auto it_src = stack.begin(); it_src != stack.end(); ) {
2138 if( !migration_required( *it_src ) ) {
2139 it_src++;
2140 continue;
2141 }
2142 auto it_dst = it_src;
2143 it_dst++;
2144 bool merged = false;
2145 for( ; it_dst != stack.end(); it_dst++ ) {
2146 const item &src = *it_src;
2147 if( it_dst->merge_charges( src ) ) {
2148 it_src = stack.erase( it_src );
2149 merged = true;
2150 break;
2151 }
2152 }
2153 if( !merged ) {
2154 it_src++;
2155 }
2156 }
2157}
2158} // namespace to_cbc_migration
2159
2160template<typename Archive>
2161void item::io( Archive &archive )
2162{
2163
2164 itype_id orig; // original ID as loaded from JSON
2165 const auto load_type = [&]( const std::string & id ) {
2166 orig = itype_id( id );
2167 convert( item_controller->migrate_id( orig ) );
2168 };
2169
2170 const auto load_curammo = [this]( const std::string & id ) {
2171 curammo = &*item_controller->migrate_id( itype_id( id ) );
2172 };
2173 const auto load_corpse = [this]( const std::string & id ) {
2174 if( itype_id( id ).is_null() ) {
2175 // backwards compatibility, nullptr should not be stored at all
2176 corpse = nullptr;
2177 } else {
2178 corpse = &mtype_id( id ).obj();
2179 }
2180 };
2181 archive.template io<const itype>( "typeid", type, load_type, []( const itype & i ) {
2182 return i.get_id().str();
2183 }, io::required_tag() );
2184
2185 // normalize legacy saves to always have charges >= 0
2186 archive.io( "charges", charges, 0 );
2187 charges = std::max( charges, 0 );
2188
2189 archive.io( "energy", energy, 0_J );
2190
2191 archive.io( "burnt", burnt, 0 );
2192 archive.io( "poison", poison, 0 );
2193 archive.io( "frequency", frequency, 0 );
2194 archive.io( "snip_id", snip_id, snippet_id::NULL_ID() );
2195 // NB! field is named `irridation` in legacy files
2196 archive.io( "irridation", irradiation, 0 );
2197 archive.io( "bday", bday, calendar::start_of_cataclysm );
2198 archive.io( "mission_id", mission_id, -1 );
2199 archive.io( "player_id", player_id, -1 );
2200 archive.io( "item_vars", item_vars, io::empty_default_tag() );
2201 // TODO: change default to empty string
2202 archive.io( "name", corpse_name, std::string() );
2203 archive.io( "owner", owner, owner.NULL_ID() );
2204 archive.io( "old_owner", old_owner, old_owner.NULL_ID() );
2205 archive.io( "invlet", invlet, '\0' );
2206 archive.io( "damaged", damage_, 0 );
2207 archive.io( "active", active, false );
2208 archive.io( "is_favorite", is_favorite, false );
2209 archive.io( "item_counter", item_counter, static_cast<decltype( item_counter )>( 0 ) );
2210 archive.io( "rot", rot, 0_turns );
2211 archive.io( "last_rot_check", last_rot_check, calendar::start_of_cataclysm );
2212 archive.io( "techniques", techniques, io::empty_default_tag() );
2213 archive.io( "faults", faults, io::empty_default_tag() );
2214 archive.io( "item_tags", item_tags, io::empty_default_tag() );
2215 archive.io( "components", components, io::empty_default_tag() );
2216 archive.io( "recipe_charges", recipe_charges, 1 );
2217 archive.template io<const itype>( "curammo", curammo, load_curammo,
2218 []( const itype & i ) {
2219 return i.get_id().str();
2220 } );
2221 archive.template io<const mtype>( "corpse", corpse, load_corpse,
2222 []( const mtype & i ) {
2223 return i.id.str();
2224 } );
2225 archive.io( "craft_data", craft_data_, decltype( craft_data_ )() );
2226 archive.io( "light", light.luminance, nolight.luminance );
2227 archive.io( "light_width", light.width, nolight.width );
2228 archive.io( "light_dir", light.direction, nolight.direction );
2229
2230 static const cata::value_ptr<relic> null_relic_ptr = nullptr;
2231 archive.io( "relic_data", relic_data, null_relic_ptr );
2232
2233 archive.io( "drop_token", drop_token, decltype( drop_token )() );
2234
2235 item_controller->migrate_item( orig, *this );
2236
2237 if( !Archive::is_input::value ) {
2238 return;
2239 }
2240 /* Loading has finished, following code is to ensure consistency and fixes bugs in saves. */
2241
2242 load_legacy_craft_data( archive, craft_data_ );
2243
2244 double float_damage = 0;
2245 if( archive.read( "damage", float_damage ) ) {
2246 damage_ = std::min( std::max( min_damage(),
2247 static_cast<int>( float_damage * itype::damage_scale ) ),
2248 max_damage() );
2249 }
2250
2251 int note = 0;
2252 const bool note_read = archive.read( "note", note );
2253
2254 // Old saves used to only contain one of those values (stored under "poison"), it would be
2255 // loaded into a union of those members. Now they are separate members and must be set separately.
2256 if( poison != 0 && note == 0 && !type->snippet_category.empty() ) {
2257 std::swap( note, poison );
2258 }
2259 if( poison != 0 && frequency == 0 && ( typeId() == itype_radio_on || typeId() == itype_radio ) ) {
2260 std::swap( frequency, poison );
2261 }
2262 if( poison != 0 && irradiation == 0 && typeId() == itype_rad_badge ) {
2263 std::swap( irradiation, poison );
2264 }
2265
2266 // erase all invalid flags (not defined in flags.json), display warning about invalid flags
2267 erase_if( item_tags, [&]( const std::string & f ) {
2268 if( !json_flag::get( f ).id.is_valid() ) {
2269 debugmsg( "item of type '%s' was loaded with undefined flag '%s'.", typeId().c_str(), f );
2270 return true;
2271 } else {
2272 return false;
2273 }
2274 } );
2275
2276 if( note_read ) {
2277 snip_id = SNIPPET.migrate_hash_to_id( note );
2278 } else {
2279 cata::optional<std::string> snip;
2280 if( archive.read( "snippet_id", snip ) && snip ) {
2281 snip_id = snippet_id( snip.value() );
2282 }
2283 }
2284
2285 // Compatibility for item type changes: for example soap changed from being a generic item
2286 // (item::charges -1 or 0 or anything else) to comestible (and thereby counted by charges),
2287 // old saves still have invalid charges, this fixes the charges value to the default charges.
2288 if( count_by_charges() && charges <= 0 ) {
2289 charges = item( type, calendar::start_of_cataclysm ).charges;
2290 }
2291 if( is_food() ) {
2292 active = true;
2293 }
2294 if( !active && item_tags.count( "WET" ) > 0 ) {
2295 // Some wet items from legacy saves may be inactive
2296 active = true;
2297 }
2298 std::string mode;
2299 if( archive.read( "mode", mode ) ) {
2300 // only for backward compatibility (nowadays mode is stored in item_vars)
2301 gun_set_mode( gun_mode_id( mode ) );
2302 }
2303
2304 // Books without any chapters don't need to store a remaining-chapters
2305 // counter, it will always be 0 and it prevents proper stacking.
2306 if( get_chapters() == 0 ) {
2307 for( auto it = item_vars.begin(); it != item_vars.end(); ) {
2308 if( it->first.compare( 0, 19, "remaining-chapters-" ) == 0 ) {
2309 item_vars.erase( it++ );
2310 } else {
2311 ++it;
2312 }
2313 }
2314 }
2315
2316 // Remove stored translated gerund in favor of storing the inscription tool type
2317 item_vars.erase( "item_label_type" );
2318 item_vars.erase( "item_note_type" );
2319
2320 // Activate corpses from old saves
2321 if( is_corpse() && !active ) {
2322 active = true;
2323 }
2324
2325 if( charges != 0 && !type->can_have_charges() ) {
2326 // Types that are known to have charges, but should not have them.
2327 // We fix it here, but it's expected from bugged saves and does not require a message.
2328 if( charge_removal_blacklist::get().count( type->get_id() ) == 0 ) {
2329 debugmsg( "Item %s was loaded with charges, but can not have any!", type->get_id() );
2330 }
2331 charges = 0;
2332 }
2333
2334 // Relic check. Kinda late, but that's how relics have to be
2335 if( relic_data ) {
2336 relic_data->check();
2337 }
2338}
2339
2340void item::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
2341{
2342 const JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
2343 data.allow_omitted_members();
2344 io::JsonObjectInputArchive archive( data );
2345 io( archive );
2346 // made for fast forwarding time from 0.D to 0.E
2347 if( savegame_loading_version < 27 ) {
2348 legacy_fast_forward_time();
2349 }
2350 if( data.has_array( "contents" ) ) {
2351 std::list<item> items;
2352 data.read( "contents", items );
2353 contents = item_contents( items );
2354 } else {
2355 data.read( "contents", contents );
2356 }
2357
2358 // Sealed item migration: items with "unseals_into" set should always have contents
2359 if( contents.empty() && is_non_resealable_container() ) {
2360 convert( type->container->unseals_into );
2361 }
2362}
2363
2364void item::serialize( JsonOut &json ) const
2365{
2366 io::JsonObjectOutputArchive archive( json );
2367 const_cast<item *>( this )->io( archive );
2368 if( !contents.empty() ) {
2369 json.member( "contents", contents );
2370 }
2371}

2373////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
2374///// vehicle.h
2375
2376/*
2377 * vehicle_part
2378 */
2379void vehicle_part::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
2380{
2381 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
2382 data.allow_omitted_members();
2383 vpart_id pid;
2384 data.read( "id", pid );
2385
2386 std::map<std::string, std::pair<std::string, std::string>> deprecated = {
2387 { "laser_gun", { "laser_rifle", "none" } },
2388 { "seat_nocargo", { "seat", "none" } },
2389 { "engine_plasma", { "minireactor", "none" } },
2390 { "battery_truck", { "battery_car", "battery" } },
2391
2392 { "diesel_tank_little", { "tank_little", "diesel" } },
2393 { "diesel_tank_small", { "tank_small", "diesel" } },
2394 { "diesel_tank_medium", { "tank_medium", "diesel" } },
2395 { "diesel_tank", { "tank", "diesel" } },
2396 { "external_diesel_tank_small", { "external_tank_small", "diesel" } },
2397 { "external_diesel_tank", { "external_tank", "diesel" } },
2398
2399 { "gas_tank_little", { "tank_little", "gasoline" } },
2400 { "gas_tank_small", { "tank_small", "gasoline" } },
2401 { "gas_tank_medium", { "tank_medium", "gasoline" } },
2402 { "gas_tank", { "tank", "gasoline" } },
2403 { "external_gas_tank_small", { "external_tank_small", "gasoline" } },
2404 { "external_gas_tank", { "external_tank", "gasoline" } },
2405
2406 { "water_dirty_tank_little", { "tank_little", "water" } },
2407 { "water_dirty_tank_small", { "tank_small", "water" } },
2408 { "water_dirty_tank_medium", { "tank_medium", "water" } },
2409 { "water_dirty_tank", { "tank", "water" } },
2410 { "external_water_dirty_tank_small", { "external_tank_small", "water" } },
2411 { "external_water_dirty_tank", { "external_tank", "water" } },
2412 { "dirty_water_tank_barrel", { "tank_barrel", "water" } },
2413
2414 { "water_tank_little", { "tank_little", "water_clean" } },
2415 { "water_tank_small", { "tank_small", "water_clean" } },
2416 { "water_tank_medium", { "tank_medium", "water_clean" } },
2417 { "water_tank", { "tank", "water_clean" } },
2418 { "external_water_tank_small", { "external_tank_small", "water_clean" } },
2419 { "external_water_tank", { "external_tank", "water_clean" } },
2420 { "water_tank_barrel", { "tank_barrel", "water_clean" } },
2421
2422 { "napalm_tank", { "tank", "napalm" } },
2423
2424 { "hydrogen_tank", { "tank", "none" } }
2425 };
2426
2427 // required for compatibility with 0.C saves
2428 itype_id legacy_fuel;
2429
2430 auto dep = deprecated.find( pid.str() );
2431 if( dep != deprecated.end() ) {
2432 pid = vpart_id( dep->second.first );
2433 legacy_fuel = itype_id( dep->second.second );
2434 }
2435
2436 // if we don't know what type of part it is, it'll cause problems later.
2437 if( !pid.is_valid() ) {
2438 if( pid.str() == "wheel_underbody" ) {
2439 pid = vpart_id( "wheel_wide" );
2440 } else {
2441 data.throw_error( "bad vehicle part", "id" );
2442 }
2443 }
2444 id = pid;
2445
2446 if( data.has_object( "base" ) ) {
2447 data.read( "base", base );
2448 } else {
2449 // handle legacy format which didn't include the base item
2450 base = item( id.obj().item );
2451 }
2452
2453 data.read( "mount_dx", mount.x );
2454 data.read( "mount_dy", mount.y );
2455 data.read( "open", open );
2456 int direction_int;
2457 data.read( "direction", direction_int );
2458 direction = units::from_degrees( direction_int );
2459 data.read( "blood", blood );
2460 data.read( "proxy_part_id", proxy_part_id );
2461 data.read( "proxy_sym", proxy_sym );
2462 data.read( "enabled", enabled );
2463 data.read( "flags", flags );
2464 data.read( "passenger_id", passenger_id );
2465 if( data.has_int( "z_offset" ) ) {
2466 int z_offset = data.get_int( "z_offset" );
2467 if( std::abs( z_offset ) > 10 ) {
2468 data.throw_error( "z_offset out of range", "z_offset" );
2469 }
2470 precalc[0].z = z_offset;
2471 precalc[1].z = z_offset;
2472 }
2473 JsonArray ja = data.get_array( "carry" );
2474 size_t sz = ja.size();
2475 for( size_t index = 0; index < sz; index++ ) {
2476 carry_names.push( ja.get_string( sz - index - 1 ) );
2477 }
2478 data.read( "crew_id", crew_id );
2479 data.read( "items", items );
2480 data.read( "target_first_x", target.first.x );
2481 data.read( "target_first_y", target.first.y );
2482 data.read( "target_first_z", target.first.z );
2483 data.read( "target_second_x", target.second.x );
2484 data.read( "target_second_y", target.second.y );
2485 data.read( "target_second_z", target.second.z );
2486 data.read( "ammo_pref", ammo_pref );
2487
2488 if( legacy_fuel.is_empty() ) {
2489 legacy_fuel = id.obj().fuel_type;
2490 }
2491
2492 // with VEHICLE tag migrate fuel tanks only if amount field exists
2493 if( base.has_flag( "VEHICLE" ) ) {
2494 if( data.has_int( "amount" ) && ammo_capacity() > 0 && legacy_fuel != itype_battery ) {
2495 ammo_set( legacy_fuel, data.get_int( "amount" ) );
2496 }
2497
2498 // without VEHICLE flag always migrate both batteries and fuel tanks
2499 } else {
2500 if( ammo_capacity() > 0 ) {
2501 ammo_set( legacy_fuel, data.get_int( "amount" ) );
2502 }
2503 base.item_tags.insert( "VEHICLE" );
2504 }
2505
2506 if( data.has_int( "hp" ) && id.obj().durability > 0 ) {
2507 // migrate legacy savegames exploiting that all base items at that time had max_damage() of 4
2508 base.set_damage( 4 * itype::damage_scale - 4 * itype::damage_scale * data.get_int( "hp" ) /
2509 id.obj().durability );
2510 }
2511
2512 // legacy turrets loaded ammo via a pseudo CARGO space
2513 if( is_turret() && !items.empty() ) {
2514 const int qty = std::accumulate( items.begin(), items.end(), 0, []( int lhs, const item & rhs ) {
2515 return lhs + rhs.charges;
2516 } );
2517 ammo_set( items.begin()->ammo_current(), qty );
2518 items.clear();
2519 }
2520}
2521
2522void vehicle_part::serialize( JsonOut &json ) const
2523{
2524 json.start_object();
2525 json.member( "id", id.str() );
2526 json.member( "base", base );
2527 json.member( "mount_dx", mount.x );
2528 json.member( "mount_dy", mount.y );
2529 json.member( "open", open );
2530 json.member( "direction", std::lround( to_degrees( direction ) ) );
2531 json.member( "blood", blood );
2532 json.member( "proxy_part_id", proxy_part_id );
2533 json.member( "proxy_sym", proxy_sym );
2534 json.member( "enabled", enabled );
2535 json.member( "flags", flags );
2536 if( !carry_names.empty() ) {
2537 std::stack<std::string, std::vector<std::string> > carry_copy = carry_names;
2538 json.member( "carry" );
2539 json.start_array();
2540 while( !carry_copy.empty() ) {
2541 json.write( carry_copy.top() );
2542 carry_copy.pop();
2543 }
2544 json.end_array();
2545 }
2546 json.member( "passenger_id", passenger_id );
2547 json.member( "crew_id", crew_id );
2548 if( precalc[0].z ) {
2549 json.member( "z_offset", precalc[0].z );
2550 }
2551 json.member( "items", items );
2552 if( target.first != tripoint_min ) {
2553 json.member( "target_first_x", target.first.x );
2554 json.member( "target_first_y", target.first.y );
2555 json.member( "target_first_z", target.first.z );
2556 }
2557 if( target.second != tripoint_min ) {
2558 json.member( "target_second_x", target.second.x );
2559 json.member( "target_second_y", target.second.y );
2560 json.member( "target_second_z", target.second.z );
2561 }
2562 json.member( "ammo_pref", ammo_pref );
2563 json.end_object();
2564}
