2587/*
2588 * Load vehicle from a json blob that might just exceed player in size.
2589 */
2590void vehicle::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
2591{
2592 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
2593 data.allow_omitted_members();
2594
2595 int fdir = 0;
2596 int mdir = 0;
2597
2598 data.read( "type", type );
2599 data.read( "posx", pos.x );
2600 data.read( "posy", pos.y );
2601 data.read( "om_id", om_id );
2602 data.read( "faceDir", fdir );
2603 data.read( "moveDir", mdir );
2604 int turn_dir_int;
2605 data.read( "turn_dir", turn_dir_int );
2606 turn_dir = units::from_degrees( turn_dir_int );
2607 data.read( "velocity", velocity );
2608 data.read( "falling", is_falling );
2609 data.read( "floating", is_floating );
2610 data.read( "flying", is_flying );
2611 data.read( "cruise_velocity", cruise_velocity );
2612 data.read( "vertical_velocity", vertical_velocity );
2613 data.read( "cruise_on", cruise_on );
2614 data.read( "engine_on", engine_on );
2615 data.read( "tracking_on", tracking_on );
2616 data.read( "skidding", skidding );
2617 data.read( "of_turn_carry", of_turn_carry );
2618 data.read( "is_locked", is_locked );
2619 data.read( "is_alarm_on", is_alarm_on );
2620 data.read( "camera_on", camera_on );
2621 if( !data.read( "last_update_turn", last_update ) ) {
2622 last_update = calendar::turn;
2623 }
2624
2625 units::angle fdir_angle = units::from_degrees( fdir );
2626 face.init( fdir_angle );
2627 move.init( units::from_degrees( mdir ) );
2628 data.read( "name", name );
2629 std::string temp_id;
2630 std::string temp_old_id;
2631 data.read( "owner", temp_id );
2632 data.read( "old_owner", temp_old_id );
2633 // for savegames before the change to faction_id for ownership.
2634 if( temp_id.empty() ) {
2635 owner = faction_id::NULL_ID();
2636 } else {
2637 owner = faction_id( temp_id );
2638 }
2639 if( temp_old_id.empty() ) {
2640 old_owner = faction_id::NULL_ID();
2641 } else {
2642 old_owner = faction_id( temp_old_id );
2643 }
2644 data.read( "theft_time", theft_time );
2645
2646 data.read( "parts", parts );
2647 // we persist the pivot anchor so that if the rules for finding
2648 // the pivot change, existing vehicles do not shift around.
2649 // Loading vehicles that predate the pivot logic is a special
2650 // case of this, they will load with an anchor of (0,0) which
2651 // is what they're expecting.
2652 data.read( "pivot", pivot_anchor[0] );
2653 pivot_anchor[1] = pivot_anchor[0];
2654 pivot_rotation[1] = pivot_rotation[0] = fdir_angle;
2655 data.read( "is_following", is_following );
2656 data.read( "is_patrolling", is_patrolling );
2657 data.read( "autodrive_local_target", autodrive_local_target );
2658 data.read( "summon_time_limit", summon_time_limit );
2659 data.read( "magic", magic );
2660
2661 // Loose items -> count-by-charges migration
2662 for( vehicle_part &part : parts ) {
2663 to_cbc_migration::migrate( part.items );
2664 }
2665
2666 // Need to manually backfill the active item cache since the part loader can't call its vehicle.
2667 for( const vpart_reference &vp : get_any_parts( VPFLAG_CARGO ) ) {
2668 auto it = vp.part().items.begin();
2669 auto end = vp.part().items.end();
2670 for( ; it != end; ++it ) {
2671 if( it->needs_processing() ) {
2672 active_items.add( *it, vp.mount() );
2673 }
2674 }
2675 }
2676
2677 for( const vpart_reference &vp : get_any_parts( "TURRET" ) ) {
2678 install_part( vp.mount(), vpart_id( "turret_mount" ), false );
2679
2680 //Forcibly set turrets' targeting mode to manual if no turret control unit is present on turret's tile on loading save
2681 if( !has_part( global_part_pos3( vp.part() ), "TURRET_CONTROLS" ) ) {
2682 vp.part().enabled = false;
2683 }
2684 //Set turret control unit's state equal to turret's targeting mode on loading save
2685 for( const vpart_reference &turret_part : get_any_parts( "TURRET_CONTROLS" ) ) {
2686 turret_part.part().enabled = vp.part().enabled;
2687 }
2688 }
2689
2690 // Add vehicle mounts to cars that are missing them.
2691 for( const vpart_reference &vp : get_any_parts( "NEEDS_WHEEL_MOUNT_LIGHT" ) ) {
2692 if( vp.info().has_flag( "STEERABLE" ) ) {
2693 install_part( vp.mount(), vpart_id( "wheel_mount_light_steerable" ), false );
2694 } else {
2695 install_part( vp.mount(), vpart_id( "wheel_mount_light" ), false );
2696 }
2697 }
2698 for( const vpart_reference &vp : get_any_parts( "NEEDS_WHEEL_MOUNT_MEDIUM" ) ) {
2699 if( vp.info().has_flag( "STEERABLE" ) ) {
2700 install_part( vp.mount(), vpart_id( "wheel_mount_medium_steerable" ), false );
2701 } else {
2702 install_part( vp.mount(), vpart_id( "wheel_mount_medium" ), false );
2703 }
2704 }
2705 for( const vpart_reference &vp : get_any_parts( "NEEDS_WHEEL_MOUNT_HEAVY" ) ) {
2706 if( vp.info().has_flag( "STEERABLE" ) ) {
2707 install_part( vp.mount(), vpart_id( "wheel_mount_heavy_steerable" ), false );
2708 } else {
2709 install_part( vp.mount(), vpart_id( "wheel_mount_heavy" ), false );
2710 }
2711 }
2712
2713 /* After loading, check if the vehicle is from the old rules and is missing
2714 * frames. */
2715 if( savegame_loading_version < 11 ) {
2716 add_missing_frames();
2717 }
2718
2719 // Handle steering changes
2720 if( savegame_loading_version < 25 ) {
2721 add_steerable_wheels();
2722 }
2723
2724 refresh();
2725
2726 data.read( "tags", tags );
2727 data.read( "labels", labels );
2728
2729 point p;
2730 zone_data zd;
2731 for( JsonObject sdata : data.get_array( "zones" ) ) {
2732 sdata.allow_omitted_members();
2733 sdata.read( "point", p );
2734 sdata.read( "zone", zd );
2735 loot_zones.emplace( p, zd );
2736 }
2737 data.read( "other_tow_point", tow_data.other_towing_point );
2738 // Note that it's possible for a vehicle to be loaded midway
2739 // through a turn if the player is driving REALLY fast and their
2740 // own vehicle motion takes them in range. An undefined value for
2741 // on_turn caused occasional weirdness if the undefined value
2742 // happened to be positive.
2743 //
2744 // Setting it to zero means it won't get to move until the start
2745 // of the next turn, which is what happens anyway if it gets
2746 // loaded anywhere but midway through a driving cycle.
2747 //
2748 // Something similar to vehicle::gain_moves() would be ideal, but
2749 // that can't be used as it currently stands because it would also
2750 // make it instantly fire all its turrets upon load.
2751 of_turn = 0;
2752
2753 /** Legacy saved games did not store part enabled status within parts */
2754 const auto set_legacy_state = [&]( const std::string & var, const std::string & flag ) {
2755 if( data.get_bool( var, false ) ) {
2756 for( const vpart_reference &vp : get_any_parts( flag ) ) {
2757 vp.part().enabled = true;
2758 }
2759 }
2760 };
2761
2762 set_legacy_state( "stereo_on", "STEREO" );
2763 set_legacy_state( "chimes_on", "CHIMES" );
2764 set_legacy_state( "fridge_on", "FRIDGE" );
2765 set_legacy_state( "reaper_on", "REAPER" );
2766 set_legacy_state( "planter_on", "PLANTER" );
2767 set_legacy_state( "recharger_on", "RECHARGE" );
2768 set_legacy_state( "scoop_on", "SCOOP" );
2769 set_legacy_state( "plow_on", "PLOW" );
2770 set_legacy_state( "reactor_on", "REACTOR" );
2771}
2772
2773void vehicle::serialize( JsonOut &json ) const
2774{
2775 json.start_object();
2776 json.member( "type", type );
2777 json.member( "posx", pos.x );
2778 json.member( "posy", pos.y );
2779 json.member( "om_id", om_id );
2780 json.member( "faceDir", std::lround( to_degrees( face.dir() ) ) );
2781 json.member( "moveDir", std::lround( to_degrees( move.dir() ) ) );
2782 json.member( "turn_dir", std::lround( to_degrees( turn_dir ) ) );
2783 json.member( "velocity", velocity );
2784 json.member( "falling", is_falling );
2785 json.member( "floating", is_floating );
2786 json.member( "flying", is_flying );
2787 json.member( "cruise_velocity", cruise_velocity );
2788 json.member( "vertical_velocity", vertical_velocity );
2789 json.member( "cruise_on", cruise_on );
2790 json.member( "engine_on", engine_on );
2791 json.member( "tracking_on", tracking_on );
2792 json.member( "skidding", skidding );
2793 json.member( "of_turn_carry", of_turn_carry );
2794 json.member( "name", name );
2795 json.member( "owner", owner );
2796 json.member( "old_owner", old_owner );
2797 json.member( "theft_time", theft_time );
2798 json.member( "parts", parts );
2799 json.member( "tags", tags );
2800 json.member( "labels", labels );
2801 json.member( "zones" );
2802 json.start_array();
2803 for( auto const &z : loot_zones ) {
2804 json.start_object();
2805 json.member( "point", z.first );
2806 json.member( "zone", z.second );
2807 json.end_object();
2808 }
2809 json.end_array();
2810 tripoint other_tow_temp_point;
2811 if( is_towed() ) {
2812 vehicle *tower = tow_data.get_towed_by();
2813 if( tower ) {
2814 other_tow_temp_point = tower->global_part_pos3( tower->get_tow_part() );
2815 }
2816 }
2817 json.member( "other_tow_point", other_tow_temp_point );
2818
2819 json.member( "is_locked", is_locked );
2820 json.member( "is_alarm_on", is_alarm_on );
2821 json.member( "camera_on", camera_on );
2822 json.member( "last_update_turn", last_update );
2823 json.member( "pivot", pivot_anchor[0] );
2824 json.member( "is_following", is_following );
2825 json.member( "is_patrolling", is_patrolling );
2826 json.member( "autodrive_local_target", autodrive_local_target );
2827 json.member( "summon_time_limit", summon_time_limit );
2828 json.member( "magic", magic );
2829 json.end_object();
2830}
2831
2832////////////////// mission.h
2833////
2834void mission::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
2835{
2836 JsonObject jo = jsin.get_object();
2837 jo.allow_omitted_members();
2838
2839 if( jo.has_int( "type_id" ) ) {
2840 type = &mission_type::from_legacy( jo.get_int( "type_id" ) ).obj();
2841 } else if( jo.has_string( "type_id" ) ) {
2842 type = &mission_type_id( jo.get_string( "type_id" ) ).obj();
2843 } else {
2844 debugmsg( "Saved mission has no type" );
2845 type = &mission_type::get_all().front();
2846 }
2847
2848 bool failed;
2849 bool was_started;
2850 std::string status_string;
2851 if( jo.read( "status", status_string ) ) {
2852 status = status_from_string( status_string );
2853 } else if( jo.read( "failed", failed ) && failed ) {
2854 status = mission_status::failure;
2855 } else if( jo.read( "was_started", was_started ) && !was_started ) {
2856 status = mission_status::yet_to_start;
2857 } else {
2858 // Note: old code had no idea of successful missions!
2859 // We can't check properly here, since most of the game isn't loaded
2860 status = mission_status::in_progress;
2861 }
2862
2863 jo.read( "value", value );
2864 jo.read( "kill_count_to_reach", kill_count_to_reach );
2865 jo.read( "reward", reward );
2866 jo.read( "uid", uid );
2867 JsonArray ja = jo.get_array( "target" );
2868 if( ja.size() == 3 ) {
2869 target.x() = ja.get_int( 0 );
2870 target.y() = ja.get_int( 1 );
2871 target.z() = ja.get_int( 2 );
2872 } else if( ja.size() == 2 ) {
2873 target.x() = ja.get_int( 0 );
2874 target.y() = ja.get_int( 1 );
2875 }
2876
2877 if( jo.has_int( "follow_up" ) ) {
2878 follow_up = mission_type::from_legacy( jo.get_int( "follow_up" ) );
2879 } else if( jo.has_string( "follow_up" ) ) {
2880 follow_up = mission_type_id( jo.get_string( "follow_up" ) );
2881 }
2882
2883 jo.read( "item_id", item_id );
2884 jo.read( "target_id", target_id );
2885
2886 if( jo.has_int( "recruit_class" ) ) {
2887 recruit_class = npc_class::from_legacy_int( jo.get_int( "recruit_class" ) );
2888 } else {
2889 recruit_class = npc_class_id( jo.get_string( "recruit_class", "NC_NONE" ) );
2890 }
2891
2892 jo.read( "target_npc_id", target_npc_id );
2893 jo.read( "monster_type", monster_type );
2894 jo.read( "monster_species", monster_species );
2895 jo.read( "monster_kill_goal", monster_kill_goal );
2896 jo.read( "deadline", deadline );
2897 jo.read( "step", step );
2898 jo.read( "item_count", item_count );
2899 jo.read( "npc_id", npc_id );
2900 jo.read( "good_fac_id", good_fac_id );
2901 jo.read( "bad_fac_id", bad_fac_id );
2902
2903 // Suppose someone had two living players in an 0.C stable world. When loading player 1 in 0.D
2904 // (or maybe even creating a new player), the former condition makes legacy_no_player_id true.
2905 // When loading player 2, there will be a player_id member in SAVE_MASTER (i.e. master.gsav),
2906 // but the bool member legacy_no_player_id will have been saved as true
2907 // (unless the mission belongs to a player that's been loaded into 0.D)
2908 // See player::deserialize and mission::set_player_id_legacy_0c
2909 legacy_no_player_id = !jo.read( "player_id", player_id ) ||
2910 jo.get_bool( "legacy_no_player_id", false );
2911}
2912
2913void mission::serialize( JsonOut &json ) const
2914{
2915 json.start_object();
2916
2917 json.member( "type_id", type->id );
2918 json.member( "status", status_to_string( status ) );
2919 json.member( "value", value );
2920 json.member( "kill_count_to_reach", kill_count_to_reach );
2921 json.member( "reward", reward );
2922 json.member( "uid", uid );
2923
2924 json.member( "target" );
2925 json.start_array();
2926 json.write( target.x() );
2927 json.write( target.y() );
2928 json.write( target.z() );
2929 json.end_array();
2930
2931 json.member( "item_id", item_id );
2932 json.member( "item_count", item_count );
2933 json.member( "target_id", target_id );
2934 json.member( "recruit_class", recruit_class );
2935 json.member( "target_npc_id", target_npc_id );
2936 json.member( "monster_type", monster_type );
2937 json.member( "monster_species", monster_species );
2938 json.member( "monster_kill_goal", monster_kill_goal );
2939 json.member( "deadline", deadline );
2940 json.member( "npc_id", npc_id );
2941 json.member( "good_fac_id", good_fac_id );
2942 json.member( "bad_fac_id", bad_fac_id );
2943 json.member( "step", step );
2944 json.member( "follow_up", follow_up );
2945 json.member( "player_id", player_id );
2946 json.member( "legacy_no_player_id", legacy_no_player_id );
2947
2948 json.end_object();
2949}

2951////////////////// faction.h
2952////
2953void faction::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
2954{
2955 JsonObject jo = jsin.get_object();
2956 jo.allow_omitted_members();
2957
2958 jo.read( "id", id );
2959 jo.read( "name", name );
2960 jo.read( "likes_u", likes_u );
2961 jo.read( "respects_u", respects_u );
2962 jo.read( "known_by_u", known_by_u );
2963 jo.read( "size", size );
2964 jo.read( "power", power );
2965 if( !jo.read( "food_supply", food_supply ) ) {
2966 food_supply = 100;
2967 }
2968 if( !jo.read( "wealth", wealth ) ) {
2969 wealth = 100;
2970 }
2971 if( jo.has_array( "opinion_of" ) ) {
2972 opinion_of = jo.get_int_array( "opinion_of" );
2973 }
2974 load_relations( jo );
2975}
2976
2977void faction::serialize( JsonOut &json ) const
2978{
2979 json.start_object();
2980
2981 json.member( "id", id );
2982 json.member( "name", name );
2983 json.member( "likes_u", likes_u );
2984 json.member( "respects_u", respects_u );
2985 json.member( "known_by_u", known_by_u );
2986 json.member( "size", size );
2987 json.member( "power", power );
2988 json.member( "food_supply", food_supply );
2989 json.member( "wealth", wealth );
2990 json.member( "opinion_of", opinion_of );
2991 json.member( "relations" );
2992 json.start_object();
2993 for( const auto &rel_data : relations ) {
2994 json.member( rel_data.first );
2995 json.start_object();
2996 for( const auto &rel_flag : npc_factions::relation_strs ) {
2997 json.member( rel_flag.first, rel_data.second.test( rel_flag.second ) );
2998 }
2999 json.end_object();
3000 }
3001 json.end_object();
3002
3003 json.end_object();
3004}
3005
3006void Creature::store( JsonOut &jsout ) const
3007{
3008 jsout.member( "moves", moves );
3009 jsout.member( "pain", pain );
3010
3011 // killer is not stored, it's temporary anyway, any creature that has a non-null
3012 // killer is dead (as per definition) and should not be stored.
3013
3014 // Because JSON requires string keys we need to convert our int keys
3015 std::unordered_map<std::string, std::unordered_map<std::string, effect>> tmp_map;
3016 for( auto maps : *effects ) {
3017 for( const auto &i : maps.second ) {
3018 if( i.second.is_removed() ) {
3019 continue;
3020 }
3021 std::ostringstream convert;
3022 convert << i.first->token;
3023 tmp_map[maps.first.str()][convert.str()] = i.second;
3024 }
3025 }
3026 jsout.member( "effects", tmp_map );
3027
3028 jsout.member( "values", values );
3029
3030 jsout.member( "blocks_left", num_blocks );
3031 jsout.member( "dodges_left", num_dodges );
3032 jsout.member( "num_blocks_bonus", num_blocks_bonus );
3033 jsout.member( "num_dodges_bonus", num_dodges_bonus );
3034
3035 jsout.member( "armor_bash_bonus", armor_bash_bonus );
3036 jsout.member( "armor_cut_bonus", armor_cut_bonus );
3037 jsout.member( "armor_bullet_bonus", armor_bullet_bonus );
3038
3039 jsout.member( "speed", speed_base );
3040
3041 jsout.member( "speed_bonus", speed_bonus );
3042 jsout.member( "dodge_bonus", dodge_bonus );
3043 jsout.member( "block_bonus", block_bonus );
3044 jsout.member( "hit_bonus", hit_bonus );
3045
3046 jsout.member( "underwater", underwater );
3047
3048 jsout.member( "body", body );
3049
3050 // fake is not stored, it's temporary anyway, only used to fire with a gun.
3051}
3052
3053void Creature::load( const JsonObject &jsin )
3054{
3055 jsin.allow_omitted_members();
3056 jsin.read( "moves", moves );
3057 jsin.read( "pain", pain );
3058
3059 killer = nullptr; // see Creature::load
3060
3061 if( jsin.has_object( "effects" ) ) {
3062 // Because JSON requires string keys we need to convert back to our bp keys
3063 std::unordered_map<std::string, std::unordered_map<std::string, effect>> tmp_map;
3064 jsin.read( "effects", tmp_map );
3065 int key_num = 0;
3066 for( auto maps : tmp_map ) {
3067 const efftype_id id( maps.first );
3068 if( !id.is_valid() ) {
3069 debugmsg( "Invalid effect: %s", id.c_str() );
3070 continue;
3071 }
3072 for( auto i : maps.second ) {
3073 if( !( std::istringstream( i.first ) >> key_num ) ) {
3074 key_num = 0;
3075 }
3076 const bodypart_str_id &bp = convert_bp( static_cast<body_part>( key_num ) );
3077 effect &e = i.second;
3078
3079 ( *effects )[id][bp] = e;
3080 on_effect_int_change( id, e.get_intensity(), bp );
3081 }
3082 }
3083 }
3084 jsin.read( "values", values );
3085
3086 jsin.read( "blocks_left", num_blocks );
3087 jsin.read( "dodges_left", num_dodges );
3088 jsin.read( "num_blocks_bonus", num_blocks_bonus );
3089 jsin.read( "num_dodges_bonus", num_dodges_bonus );
3090
3091 jsin.read( "armor_bash_bonus", armor_bash_bonus );
3092 jsin.read( "armor_cut_bonus", armor_cut_bonus );
3093 jsin.read( "armor_bullet_bonus", armor_bullet_bonus );
3094
3095 jsin.read( "speed", speed_base );
3096
3097 jsin.read( "speed_bonus", speed_bonus );
3098 jsin.read( "dodge_bonus", dodge_bonus );
3099 jsin.read( "block_bonus", block_bonus );
3100 jsin.read( "hit_bonus", hit_bonus );
3101
3102 jsin.read( "underwater", underwater );
3103
3104 jsin.read( "body", body );
3105
3106 fake = false; // see Creature::load
3107
3108 on_stat_change( "pain", pain );
3109}

3188struct mm_elem {
3189 memorized_terrain_tile tile;
3190 int symbol;
3191
3192 bool operator==( const mm_elem &rhs ) const {
3193 return symbol == rhs.symbol && tile == rhs.tile;
3194 }
3195};
3196
3197void mm_submap::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
3198{
3199 jsout.start_array();
3200
3201 // Uses RLE for compression.
3202
3203 mm_elem last;
3204 int num_same = 1;
3205
3206 const auto write_seq = [&]() {
3207 jsout.start_array();
3208 jsout.write( last.tile.tile );
3209 jsout.write( last.tile.subtile );
3210 jsout.write( last.tile.rotation );
3211 jsout.write( last.symbol );
3212 if( num_same != 1 ) {
3213 jsout.write( num_same );
3214 }
3215 jsout.end_array();
3216 };
3217
3218 for( size_t y = 0; y < SEEY; y++ ) {
3219 for( size_t x = 0; x < SEEX; x++ ) {
3220 point p( x, y );
3221 const mm_elem elem = { tile( p ), symbol( p ) };
3222 if( x == 0 && y == 0 ) {
3223 last = elem;
3224 continue;
3225 }
3226 if( last == elem ) {
3227 num_same += 1;
3228 continue;
3229 }
3230 write_seq();
3231 num_same = 1;
3232 last = elem;
3233 }
3234 }
3235 write_seq();
3236
3237 jsout.end_array();
3238}
3239
3240void mm_submap::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
3241{
3242 jsin.start_array();
3243
3244 // Uses RLE for compression.
3245
3246 mm_elem elem;
3247 size_t remaining = 0;
3248
3249 for( size_t y = 0; y < SEEY; y++ ) {
3250 for( size_t x = 0; x < SEEX; x++ ) {
3251 if( remaining > 0 ) {
3252 remaining -= 1;
3253 } else {
3254 jsin.start_array();
3255 elem.tile.tile = jsin.get_string();
3256 elem.tile.subtile = jsin.get_int();
3257 elem.tile.rotation = jsin.get_int();
3258 elem.symbol = jsin.get_int();
3259 if( jsin.test_int() ) {
3260 remaining = jsin.get_int() - 1;
3261 }
3262 jsin.end_array();
3263 }
3264 point p( x, y );
3265 // Try to avoid assigning to save up on memory
3266 if( elem.tile != mm_submap::default_tile ) {
3267 set_tile( p, elem.tile );
3268 }
3269 if( elem.symbol != mm_submap::default_symbol ) {
3270 set_symbol( p, elem.symbol );
3271 }
3272 }
3273 }
3274 jsin.end_array();
3275}
3276
3277void mm_region::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
3278{
3279 jsout.start_array();
3280 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(modernize-loop-convert): leaving as is for readability
3281 for( size_t y = 0; y < MM_REG_SIZE; y++ ) {
3282 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(modernize-loop-convert): leaving as is for readability
3283 for( size_t x = 0; x < MM_REG_SIZE; x++ ) {
3284 const shared_ptr_fast<mm_submap> &sm = submaps[x][y];
3285 if( sm->is_empty() ) {
3286 jsout.write_null();
3287 } else {
3288 sm->serialize( jsout );
3289 }
3290 }
3291 }
3292 jsout.end_array();
3293}
3294
3295void mm_region::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
3296{
3297 jsin.start_array();
3298 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(modernize-loop-convert): leaving as is for readability
3299 for( size_t y = 0; y < MM_REG_SIZE; y++ ) {
3300 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(modernize-loop-convert): leaving as is for readability
3301 for( size_t x = 0; x < MM_REG_SIZE; x++ ) {
3302 shared_ptr_fast<mm_submap> &sm = submaps[x][y];
3303 sm = make_shared_fast<mm_submap>();
3304 if( jsin.test_null() ) {
3305 jsin.skip_null();
3306 } else {
3307 sm->deserialize( jsin );
3308 }
3309 }
3310 }
3311 jsin.end_array();
3312}
3313
3314void map_memory::load_legacy( JsonIn &jsin )
3315{
3316 struct mig_elem {
3317 int symbol;
3318 memorized_terrain_tile tile;
3319 };
3320 std::map<tripoint, mig_elem> elems;
3321
3322 jsin.start_array();
3323 jsin.start_array();
3324 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
3325 jsin.start_array();
3326 tripoint p;
3327 p.x = jsin.get_int();
3328 p.y = jsin.get_int();
3329 p.z = jsin.get_int();
3330 mig_elem &elem = elems[p];
3331 elem.tile.tile = jsin.get_string();
3332 elem.tile.subtile = jsin.get_int();
3333 elem.tile.rotation = jsin.get_int();
3334 jsin.end_array();
3335 }
3336 jsin.start_array();
3337 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
3338 jsin.start_array();
3339 tripoint p;
3340 p.x = jsin.get_int();
3341 p.y = jsin.get_int();
3342 p.z = jsin.get_int();
3343 elems[p].symbol = jsin.get_int();
3344 jsin.end_array();
3345 }
3346 jsin.end_array();
3347
3348 for( const std::pair<const tripoint, mig_elem> &elem : elems ) {
3349 coord_pair cp( elem.first );
3350 shared_ptr_fast<mm_submap> sm = find_submap( cp.sm );
3351 if( !sm ) {
3352 sm = allocate_submap( cp.sm );
3353 }
3354 if( elem.second.tile != mm_submap::default_tile ) {
3355 sm->set_tile( cp.loc, elem.second.tile );
3356 }
3357 if( elem.second.symbol != mm_submap::default_symbol ) {
3358 sm->set_symbol( cp.loc, elem.second.symbol );
3359 }
3360 }
3361}

3527// basecamp
3528void basecamp::serialize( JsonOut &json ) const
3529{
3530 if( omt_pos != tripoint_abs_omt() ) {
3531 json.start_object();
3532 json.member( "name", name );
3533 json.member( "pos", omt_pos );
3534 json.member( "bb_pos", bb_pos );
3535 json.member( "expansions" );
3536 json.start_array();
3537 for( const auto &expansion : expansions ) {
3538 json.start_object();
3539 json.member( "dir", expansion.first );
3540 json.member( "type", expansion.second.type );
3541 json.member( "provides" );
3542 json.start_array();
3543 for( const auto &provide : expansion.second.provides ) {
3544 json.start_object();
3545 json.member( "id", provide.first );
3546 json.member( "amount", provide.second );
3547 json.end_object();
3548 }
3549 json.end_array();
3550 json.member( "in_progress" );
3551 json.start_array();
3552 for( const auto &working : expansion.second.in_progress ) {
3553 json.start_object();
3554 json.member( "id", working.first );
3555 json.member( "amount", working.second );
3556 json.end_object();
3557 }
3558 json.end_array();
3559 json.member( "pos", expansion.second.pos );
3560 json.end_object();
3561 }
3562 json.end_array();
3563 json.member( "fortifications" );
3564 json.start_array();
3565 for( const auto &fortification : fortifications ) {
3566 json.start_object();
3567 json.member( "pos", fortification );
3568 json.end_object();
3569 }
3570 json.end_array();
3571 json.end_object();
3572 } else {
3573 return;
3574 }
3575}
3576
3577void basecamp::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
3578{
3579 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
3580 data.allow_omitted_members();
3581 data.read( "name", name );
3582 data.read( "pos", omt_pos );
3583 data.read( "bb_pos", bb_pos );
3584 for( JsonObject edata : data.get_array( "expansions" ) ) {
3585 edata.allow_omitted_members();
3586 expansion_data e;
3587 point dir;
3588 if( edata.has_string( "dir" ) ) {
3589 // old save compatibility
3590 const std::string dir_id = edata.get_string( "dir" );
3591 dir = base_camps::direction_from_id( dir_id );
3592 } else {
3593 edata.read( "dir", dir );
3594 }
3595 edata.read( "type", e.type );
3596 if( edata.has_int( "cur_level" ) ) {
3597 edata.read( "cur_level", e.cur_level );
3598 }
3599 if( edata.has_array( "provides" ) ) {
3600 e.cur_level = -1;
3601 for( JsonObject provide_data : edata.get_array( "provides" ) ) {
3602 provide_data.allow_omitted_members();
3603 std::string id = provide_data.get_string( "id" );
3604 int amount = provide_data.get_int( "amount" );
3605 e.provides[ id ] = amount;
3606 }
3607 }
3608 // incase of save corruption, sanity check provides from expansions
3609 const std::string &initial_provide = base_camps::faction_encode_abs( e, 0 );
3610 if( e.provides.find( initial_provide ) == e.provides.end() ) {
3611 e.provides[ initial_provide ] = 1;
3612 }
3613 for( JsonObject in_progress_data : edata.get_array( "in_progress" ) ) {
3614 in_progress_data.allow_omitted_members();
3615 std::string id = in_progress_data.get_string( "id" );
3616 int amount = in_progress_data.get_int( "amount" );
3617 e.in_progress[ id ] = amount;
3618 }
3619 edata.read( "pos", e.pos );
3620 expansions[ dir ] = e;
3621 if( dir != base_camps::base_dir ) {
3622 directions.push_back( dir );
3623 }
3624 }
3625 for( JsonObject edata : data.get_array( "fortifications" ) ) {
3626 edata.allow_omitted_members();
3627 tripoint_abs_omt restore_pos;
3628 edata.read( "pos", restore_pos );
3629 fortifications.push_back( restore_pos );
3630 }
3631}

3717
3718void submap::store( JsonOut &jsout ) const
3719{
3720 jsout.member( "turn_last_touched", last_touched );
3721 jsout.member( "temperature", temperature );
3722
3723 // Terrain is saved using a simple RLE scheme. Legacy saves don't have
3724 // this feature but the algorithm is backward compatible.
3725 jsout.member( "terrain" );
3726 jsout.start_array();
3727 std::string last_id;
3728 int num_same = 1;
3729 for( int j = 0; j < SEEY; j++ ) {
3730 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(modernize-loop-convert)
3731 for( int i = 0; i < SEEX; i++ ) {
3732 const std::string this_id = ter[i][j].obj().id.str();
3733 if( !last_id.empty() ) {
3734 if( this_id == last_id ) {
3735 num_same++;
3736 } else {
3737 if( num_same == 1 ) {
3738 // if there's only one element don't write as an array
3739 jsout.write( last_id );
3740 } else {
3741 jsout.start_array();
3742 jsout.write( last_id );
3743 jsout.write( num_same );
3744 jsout.end_array();
3745 num_same = 1;
3746 }
3747 last_id = this_id;
3748 }
3749 } else {
3750 last_id = this_id;
3751 }
3752 }
3753 }
3754 // Because of the RLE scheme we have to do one last pass
3755 if( num_same == 1 ) {
3756 jsout.write( last_id );
3757 } else {
3758 jsout.start_array();
3759 jsout.write( last_id );
3760 jsout.write( num_same );
3761 jsout.end_array();
3762 }
3763 jsout.end_array();
3764
3765 // Write out the radiation array in a simple RLE scheme.
3766 // written in intensity, count pairs
3767 jsout.member( "radiation" );
3768 jsout.start_array();
3769 int lastrad = -1;
3770 int count = 0;
3771 for( int j = 0; j < SEEY; j++ ) {
3772 for( int i = 0; i < SEEX; i++ ) {
3773 const point p( i, j );
3774 // Save radiation, re-examine this because it doesn't look like it works right
3775 int r = get_radiation( p );
3776 if( r == lastrad ) {
3777 count++;
3778 } else {
3779 if( count ) {
3780 jsout.write( count );
3781 }
3782 jsout.write( r );
3783 lastrad = r;
3784 count = 1;
3785 }
3786 }
3787 }
3788 jsout.write( count );
3789 jsout.end_array();
3790
3791 jsout.member( "furniture" );
3792 jsout.start_array();
3793 for( int j = 0; j < SEEY; j++ ) {
3794 for( int i = 0; i < SEEX; i++ ) {
3795 const point p( i, j );
3796 // Save furniture
3797 if( get_furn( p ) ) {
3798 jsout.start_array();
3799 jsout.write( p.x );
3800 jsout.write( p.y );
3801 jsout.write( get_furn( p ).obj().id );
3802 jsout.end_array();
3803 }
3804 }
3805 }
3806 jsout.end_array();
3807
3808 jsout.member( "items" );
3809 jsout.start_array();
3810 for( int j = 0; j < SEEY; j++ ) {
3811 for( int i = 0; i < SEEX; i++ ) {
3812 if( itm[i][j].empty() ) {
3813 continue;
3814 }
3815 jsout.write( i );
3816 jsout.write( j );
3817 jsout.write( itm[i][j] );
3818 }
3819 }
3820 jsout.end_array();
3821
3822 jsout.member( "traps" );
3823 jsout.start_array();
3824 for( int j = 0; j < SEEY; j++ ) {
3825 for( int i = 0; i < SEEX; i++ ) {
3826 const point p( i, j );
3827 // Save traps
3828 if( get_trap( p ) ) {
3829 jsout.start_array();
3830 jsout.write( p.x );
3831 jsout.write( p.y );
3832 // TODO: jsout should support writing an id like jsout.write( trap_id )
3833 jsout.write( get_trap( p ).id().str() );
3834 jsout.end_array();
3835 }
3836 }
3837 }
3838 jsout.end_array();
3839
3840 jsout.member( "fields" );
3841 jsout.start_array();
3842 for( int j = 0; j < SEEY; j++ ) {
3843 for( int i = 0; i < SEEX; i++ ) {
3844 // Save fields
3845 if( fld[i][j].field_count() > 0 ) {
3846 jsout.write( i );
3847 jsout.write( j );
3848 jsout.start_array();
3849 for( auto &elem : fld[i][j] ) {
3850 const field_entry &cur = elem.second;
3851 jsout.write( cur.get_field_type().id() );
3852 jsout.write( cur.get_field_intensity() );
3853 jsout.write( cur.get_field_age() );
3854 }
3855 jsout.end_array();
3856 }
3857 }
3858 }
3859 jsout.end_array();
3860
3861 // Write out as array of arrays of single entries
3862 jsout.member( "cosmetics" );
3863 jsout.start_array();
3864 for( const auto &cosm : cosmetics ) {
3865 jsout.start_array();
3866 jsout.write( cosm.pos.x );
3867 jsout.write( cosm.pos.y );
3868 jsout.write( cosm.type );
3869 jsout.write( cosm.str );
3870 jsout.end_array();
3871 }
3872 jsout.end_array();
3873
3874 // Output the spawn points
3875 jsout.member( "spawns" );
3876 jsout.start_array();
3877 for( auto &elem : spawns ) {
3878 jsout.start_array();
3879 // TODO: json should know how to write string_ids
3880 jsout.write( elem.type.str() );
3881 jsout.write( elem.count );
3882 jsout.write( elem.pos.x );
3883 jsout.write( elem.pos.y );
3884 jsout.write( elem.faction_id );
3885 jsout.write( elem.mission_id );
3886 jsout.write( elem.friendly );
3887 jsout.write( elem.name );
3888 jsout.end_array();
3889 }
3890 jsout.end_array();
3891
3892 jsout.member( "vehicles" );
3893 jsout.start_array();
3894 for( auto &elem : vehicles ) {
3895 // json lib doesn't know how to turn a vehicle * into a vehicle,
3896 // so we have to iterate manually.
3897 jsout.write( *elem );
3898 }
3899 jsout.end_array();
3900
3901 jsout.member( "partial_constructions" );
3902 jsout.start_array();
3903 for( auto &elem : partial_constructions ) {
3904 jsout.write( elem.first.x );
3905 jsout.write( elem.first.y );
3906 jsout.write( elem.first.z );
3907 jsout.write( elem.second.counter );
3908 jsout.write( elem.second.id.id() );
3909 jsout.start_array();
3910 for( auto &it : elem.second.components ) {
3911 jsout.write( it );
3912 }
3913 jsout.end_array();
3914 }
3915 jsout.end_array();
3916
3917 if( legacy_computer ) {
3918 // it's possible that no access to computers has been made and legacy_computer
3919 // is not cleared
3920 jsout.member( "computers", *legacy_computer );
3921 } else if( !computers.empty() ) {
3922 jsout.member( "computers" );
3923 jsout.start_array();
3924 for( auto &elem : computers ) {
3925 jsout.write( elem.first );
3926 jsout.write( elem.second );
3927 }
3928 jsout.end_array();
3929 }
3930
3931 // Output base camp if any
3932 if( camp ) {
3933 jsout.member( "camp", *camp );
3934 }
3935
3936 jsout.member( "active_furniture" );
3937 jsout.start_array();
3938 for( auto &pr : active_furniture ) {
3939 jsout.write( pr.first );
3940 pr.second.serialize( jsout );
3941 }
3942 jsout.end_array();
3943}
3944
3945void submap::load( JsonIn &jsin, const std::string &member_name, int version )
3946{
3947 if( member_name == "turn_last_touched" ) {
3948 last_touched = calendar::turn_zero + time_duration::from_turns( jsin.get_int() );
3949 } else if( member_name == "temperature" ) {
3950 temperature = jsin.get_int();
3951 } else if( member_name == "terrain" ) {
3952 // TODO: try block around this to error out if we come up short?
3953 jsin.start_array();
3954 // terrain is encoded using simple RLE
3955 int remaining = 0;
3956 int_id<ter_t> iid;
3957 for( int j = 0; j < SEEY; j++ ) {
3958 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(modernize-loop-convert)
3959 for( int i = 0; i < SEEX; i++ ) {
3960 if( !remaining ) {
3961 if( jsin.test_string() ) {
3962 iid = ter_str_id( jsin.get_string() ).id();
3963 } else if( jsin.test_array() ) {
3964 jsin.start_array();
3965 iid = ter_str_id( jsin.get_string() ).id();
3966 remaining = jsin.get_int() - 1;
3967 jsin.end_array();
3968 } else {
3969 debugmsg( "Mapbuffer terrain data is corrupt, expected string or array." );
3970 }
3971 } else {
3972 --remaining;
3973 }
3974 ter[i][j] = iid;
3975 }
3976 }
3977 if( remaining ) {
3978 debugmsg( "Mapbuffer terrain data is corrupt, tile data remaining." );
3979 }
3980 jsin.end_array();
3981 } else if( member_name == "radiation" ) {
3982 int rad_cell = 0;
3983 jsin.start_array();
3984 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
3985 int rad_strength = jsin.get_int();
3986 int rad_num = jsin.get_int();
3987 for( int i = 0; i < rad_num; ++i ) {
3988 if( rad_cell < SEEX * SEEY ) {
3989 set_radiation( { 0 % SEEX, rad_cell / SEEX }, rad_strength );
3990 rad_cell++;
3991 }
3992 }
3993 }
3994 } else if( member_name == "furniture" ) {
3995 jsin.start_array();
3996 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
3997 jsin.start_array();
3998 int i = jsin.get_int();
3999 int j = jsin.get_int();
4000 frn[i][j] = furn_id( jsin.get_string() );
4001 jsin.end_array();
4002 }
4003 } else if( member_name == "items" ) {
4004 jsin.start_array();
4005 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
4006 int i = jsin.get_int();
4007 int j = jsin.get_int();
4008 const point p( i, j );
4009 jsin.start_array();
4010 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
4011 item tmp;
4012 jsin.read( tmp );
4013
4014 if( tmp.is_emissive() ) {
4015 update_lum_add( p, tmp );
4016 }
4017
4018 if( savegame_loading_version >= 27 && version < 27 ) {
4019 tmp.legacy_fast_forward_time();
4020 }
4021
4022 const cata::colony<item>::iterator it = itm[p.x][p.y].insert( tmp );
4023 if( tmp.needs_processing() ) {
4024 active_items.add( *it, p );
4025 }
4026 }
4027 }
4028 for( auto &it1 : itm ) {
4029 for( auto &it2 : it1 ) {
4030 to_cbc_migration::migrate( it2 );
4031 }
4032 }
4033 } else if( member_name == "traps" ) {
4034 jsin.start_array();
4035 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
4036 jsin.start_array();
4037 int i = jsin.get_int();
4038 int j = jsin.get_int();
4039 const point p( i, j );
4040 // TODO: jsin should support returning an id like jsin.get_id<trap>()
4041 trp[p.x][p.y] = trap_str_id( jsin.get_string() ).id();
4042 jsin.end_array();
4043 }
4044 } else if( member_name == "fields" ) {
4045 jsin.start_array();
4046 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
4047 // Coordinates loop
4048 int i = jsin.get_int();
4049 int j = jsin.get_int();
4050 jsin.start_array();
4051 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
4052 // TODO: Check enum->string migration below
4053 int type_int = 0;
4054 std::string type_str;
4055 if( jsin.test_int() ) {
4056 type_int = jsin.get_int();
4057 } else {
4058 type_str = jsin.get_string();
4059 }
4060 int intensity = jsin.get_int();
4061 int age = jsin.get_int();
4062 field_type_id ft;
4063 if( !type_str.empty() ) {
4064 ft = field_type_id( type_str );
4065 } else {
4066 ft = field_types::get_field_type_by_legacy_enum( type_int ).id;
4067 }
4068 if( fld[i][j].find_field( ft ) == nullptr ) {
4069 field_count++;
4070 }
4071 fld[i][j].add_field( ft, intensity, time_duration::from_turns( age ) );
4072 }
4073 }
4074 } else if( member_name == "graffiti" ) {
4075 jsin.start_array();
4076 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
4077 jsin.start_array();
4078 int i = jsin.get_int();
4079 int j = jsin.get_int();
4080 const point p( i, j );
4081 set_graffiti( p, jsin.get_string() );
4082 jsin.end_array();
4083 }
4084 } else if( member_name == "cosmetics" ) {
4085 jsin.start_array();
4086 std::map<std::string, std::string> tcosmetics;
4087
4088 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
4089 jsin.start_array();
4090 int i = jsin.get_int();
4091 int j = jsin.get_int();
4092 const point p( i, j );
4093 std::string type, str;
4094 // Try to read as current format
4095 if( jsin.test_string() ) {
4096 type = jsin.get_string();
4097 str = jsin.get_string();
4098 insert_cosmetic( p, type, str );
4099 } else {
4100 // Otherwise read as most recent old format
4101 jsin.read( tcosmetics );
4102 for( auto &cosm : tcosmetics ) {
4103 insert_cosmetic( p, cosm.first, cosm.second );
4104 }
4105 tcosmetics.clear();
4106 }
4107
4108 jsin.end_array();
4109 }
4110 } else if( member_name == "spawns" ) {
4111 jsin.start_array();
4112 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
4113 jsin.start_array();
4114 // TODO: json should know how to read an string_id
4115 const mtype_id type = mtype_id( jsin.get_string() );
4116 int count = jsin.get_int();
4117 int i = jsin.get_int();
4118 int j = jsin.get_int();
4119 const point p( i, j );
4120 int faction_id = jsin.get_int();
4121 int mission_id = jsin.get_int();
4122 bool friendly = jsin.get_bool();
4123 std::string name = jsin.get_string();
4124 jsin.end_array();
4125 spawn_point tmp( type, count, p, faction_id, mission_id, friendly, name );
4126 spawns.push_back( tmp );
4127 }
4128 } else if( member_name == "vehicles" ) {
4129 jsin.start_array();
4130 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
4131 std::unique_ptr<vehicle> tmp = std::make_unique<vehicle>();
4132 jsin.read( *tmp );
4133 vehicles.push_back( std::move( tmp ) );
4134 }
4135 } else if( member_name == "partial_constructions" ) {
4136 jsin.start_array();
4137 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
4138 partial_con pc;
4139 int i = jsin.get_int();
4140 int j = jsin.get_int();
4141 int k = jsin.get_int();
4142 tripoint pt = tripoint( i, j, k );
4143 pc.counter = jsin.get_int();
4144 if( jsin.test_int() ) {
4145 // Oops, int id incorrectly saved by legacy code, just load it and hope for the best
4146 pc.id = construction_id( jsin.get_int() );
4147 } else {
4148 pc.id = construction_str_id( jsin.get_string() ).id();
4149 }
4150 jsin.start_array();
4151 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
4152 item tmp;
4153 jsin.read( tmp );
4154 pc.components.push_back( tmp );
4155 }
4156 partial_constructions[pt] = pc;
4157 }
4158 } else if( member_name == "computers" ) {
4159 if( jsin.test_array() ) {
4160 jsin.start_array();
4161 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
4162 point loc;
4163 jsin.read( loc );
4164 auto new_comp_it = computers.emplace( loc, computer( "BUGGED_COMPUTER", -100 ) ).first;
4165 jsin.read( new_comp_it->second );
4166 }
4167 } else {
4168 // only load legacy data here, but do not update to std::map, since
4169 // the terrain may not have been loaded yet.
4170 legacy_computer = std::make_unique<computer>( "BUGGED_COMPUTER", -100 );
4171 jsin.read( *legacy_computer );
4172 }
4173 } else if( member_name == "camp" ) {
4174 camp = std::make_unique<basecamp>();
4175 jsin.read( *camp );
4176 } else if( member_name == "active_furniture" ) {
4177 jsin.start_array();
4178 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
4179 point_sm_ms p;
4180 jsin.read( p );
4181 active_furniture[p].deserialize( jsin );
4182 }
4183 } else {
4184 jsin.skip_value();
4185 }
4186}

4255
4256void uistatedata::serialize( JsonOut &json ) const
4257{
4258 const unsigned int input_history_save_max = 25;
4259 json.start_object();
4260
4261 transfer_save.serialize( json, "transfer_save_" );
4262
4263 /**** if you want to save whatever so it's whatever when the game is started next, declare here and.... ****/
4264 // non array stuffs
4265 json.member( "adv_inv_container_location", adv_inv_container_location );
4266 json.member( "adv_inv_container_index", adv_inv_container_index );
4267 json.member( "adv_inv_container_in_vehicle", adv_inv_container_in_vehicle );
4268 json.member( "adv_inv_container_type", adv_inv_container_type );
4269 json.member( "adv_inv_container_content_type", adv_inv_container_content_type );
4270 json.member( "debug_menu", debug_menu );
4271 json.member( "editmap_nsa_viewmode", editmap_nsa_viewmode );
4272 json.member( "overmap_blinking", overmap_blinking );
4273 json.member( "overmap_show_overlays", overmap_show_overlays );
4274 json.member( "overmap_show_map_notes", overmap_show_map_notes );
4275 json.member( "overmap_show_land_use_codes", overmap_show_land_use_codes );
4276 json.member( "overmap_show_city_labels", overmap_show_city_labels );
4277 json.member( "overmap_show_hordes", overmap_show_hordes );
4278 json.member( "overmap_show_forest_trails", overmap_show_forest_trails );
4279 json.member( "vmenu_show_items", vmenu_show_items );
4280 json.member( "list_item_sort", list_item_sort );
4281 json.member( "list_item_filter_active", list_item_filter_active );
4282 json.member( "list_item_downvote_active", list_item_downvote_active );
4283 json.member( "list_item_priority_active", list_item_priority_active );
4284 json.member( "hidden_recipes", hidden_recipes );
4285 json.member( "favorite_recipes", favorite_recipes );
4286 json.member( "recent_recipes", recent_recipes );
4287 json.member( "favorite_construct_recipes", favorite_construct_recipes );
4288 json.member( "bionic_ui_sort_mode", bionic_sort_mode );
4289 json.member( "overmap_debug_weather", overmap_debug_weather );
4290 json.member( "overmap_visible_weather", overmap_visible_weather );
4291
4292 json.member( "input_history" );
4293 json.start_object();
4294 for( auto &e : input_history ) {
4295 json.member( e.first );
4296 const std::vector<std::string> &history = e.second;
4297 json.start_array();
4298 int save_start = 0;
4299 if( history.size() > input_history_save_max ) {
4300 save_start = history.size() - input_history_save_max;
4301 }
4302 for( std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator hit = history.begin() + save_start;
4303 hit != history.end(); ++hit ) {
4304 json.write( *hit );
4305 }
4306 json.end_array();
4307 }
4308 json.end_object(); // input_history
4309
4310 json.end_object();
4311}

4313void uistatedata::deserialize( const JsonObject &jo )
4314{
4315 transfer_save.deserialize( jo, "transfer_save_" );
4316
4317 // the rest
4318 jo.read( "adv_inv_container_location", adv_inv_container_location );
4319 jo.read( "adv_inv_container_index", adv_inv_container_index );
4320 jo.read( "adv_inv_container_in_vehicle", adv_inv_container_in_vehicle );
4321 jo.read( "adv_inv_container_type", adv_inv_container_type );
4322 jo.read( "adv_inv_container_content_type", adv_inv_container_content_type );
4323 jo.read( "debug_menu", debug_menu );
4324 jo.read( "editmap_nsa_viewmode", editmap_nsa_viewmode );
4325 jo.read( "overmap_blinking", overmap_blinking );
4326 jo.read( "overmap_show_overlays", overmap_show_overlays );
4327 jo.read( "overmap_show_map_notes", overmap_show_map_notes );
4328 jo.read( "overmap_show_land_use_codes", overmap_show_land_use_codes );
4329 jo.read( "overmap_show_city_labels", overmap_show_city_labels );
4330 jo.read( "overmap_show_hordes", overmap_show_hordes );
4331 jo.read( "overmap_show_forest_trails", overmap_show_forest_trails );
4332 jo.read( "hidden_recipes", hidden_recipes );
4333 jo.read( "favorite_recipes", favorite_recipes );
4334 jo.read( "recent_recipes", recent_recipes );
4335 jo.read( "favorite_construct_recipes", favorite_construct_recipes );
4336 jo.read( "bionic_ui_sort_mode", bionic_sort_mode );
4337 jo.read( "overmap_debug_weather", overmap_debug_weather );
4338 jo.read( "overmap_visible_weather", overmap_visible_weather );
4339
4340 if( !jo.read( "vmenu_show_items", vmenu_show_items ) ) {
4341 // This is an old save: 1 means view items, 2 means view monsters,
4342 // -1 means uninitialized
4343 vmenu_show_items = jo.get_int( "list_item_mon", -1 ) != 2;
4344 }
4345
4346 jo.read( "list_item_sort", list_item_sort );
4347 jo.read( "list_item_filter_active", list_item_filter_active );
4348 jo.read( "list_item_downvote_active", list_item_downvote_active );
4349 jo.read( "list_item_priority_active", list_item_priority_active );
4350

4352 std::vector<std::string> &v = gethistory( member.name() );
4353 v.clear();
4354 for( const std::string line : member.get_array() ) {
4355 v.push_back( line );
4356 }
4357 }
4358 // fetch list_item settings from input_history
4359 if( !gethistory( "item_filter" ).empty() ) {
4360 list_item_filter = gethistory( "item_filter" ).back();
4361 }
4362 if( !gethistory( "list_item_downvote" ).empty() ) {
4363 list_item_downvote = gethistory( "list_item_downvote" ).back();
4364 }
